Esa nayo sabbattha īdisesu ṭhānesu. ^b^Senāsanaggāho ca paṭippassambhatī^eb^ti iminā ca chinnavasso ca hotīti dīpeti. ^b^Sace ākiṇṇadosova hoti, āyatiṃ saṃvare na tiṭṭhati, nikkaḍḍhitabbo^eb^ti ettha sace yāvatatiyaṃ vuccamāno na oramati, saṅghaṃ apaloketvā nāsetabbo. Puna pabbajjaṃ yācamānopi apaloketvā pabbājetabboti vadanti. ^b^Pacchimikāya vassāvāsikaṃ lacchatī^eb^ti pacchimikāya puna vassaṃ upagatattā lacchati. ^b^Apaloketvā lābho dātabbo^eb^ti chinnavassatāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Itarāni pañca sikkhāpadānī^eb^ti vikālabhojanādīni pañca. ^b^Accayaṃ desāpetabbo^eb^ti ‘‘accayo maṃ, bhante, accagamā’’tiādinā nayena desāpetabbo.
[06]Anāpucchāvaraṇavatthuādikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^109^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paṇḍakavatthumhi ^a^V3.0233^ea^ ‘‘yo kāḷapakkhe itthī hoti, juṇhapakkhe puriso, ayaṃ ^b^pakkhapaṇḍako’’^eb^ti keci vadanti, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘kāḷapakkhe paṇḍako hoti, juṇhapakkhe panassa pariḷāho vūpasammatī’’ti apaṇḍakapakkhe pariḷāhavūpasamasseva vuttattā paṇḍakapakkhe ussannapariḷāhatā paṇḍakabhāvāpattīti viññāyati, tasmā idamevettha sārato paccetabbaṃ. Itthibhāvo pumbhāvo vā natthi etassāti ^b^abhāvako. Tasmiṃ yevassa pakkhe pabbajjā vāritā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘apaṇḍakapakkhe pabbājetvā paṇḍakapakkhe nāsetabbo’’ti ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘apaṇḍakapakkhe pabbajito sace kilesakkhayaṃ pāpuṇāti, na nāsetabbo’’ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ paṇḍakassa kilesakkhayāsambhavato khīṇakilesassa ca paṇḍakabhāvānupapattito. Ahetukapaṭisandhikathāyañhi avisesena paṇḍakassa ahetukapaṭisandhitā vuttā. Āsittausūyapakkhapaṇḍakānañca paṭisandhito paṭṭhāyeva paṇḍakasabhāvo, na pavattiyaṃyevāti vadanti. Teneva ahetukapaṭisandhiniddese jaccandhabadhirādayo viya paṇḍako jātisaddena visesetvā na niddiṭṭho. Idhāpi ^a^M3.0257^ea^ catutthapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ (pārā. aṭṭha. 2.233) ‘‘abhabbapuggale dassentena paṇḍakatiracchānagataubhatobyañjanakā tayo vatthuvipannā ahetukapaṭisandhikā, tesaṃ saggo avārito, maggo pana vārito’’ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
[06]Paṇḍakavatthukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^110^eb^^b^.^eb^ Theyyasaṃvāsakavatthumhi ^b^kolaññā^eb^ti mātuvaṃse pituvaṃse ca jātā mātāpituppabhutisabbañātayo. Theyyāya saṃvāso etassāti ^b^theyyasaṃvāsako^eb^. So ca na saṃvāsamattasseva thenako idhādhippeto, atha kho liṅgassa tadubhayassa ca thenakopīti āha ^b^‘‘tayo theyyasaṃvāsakā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Na yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyatī^eb^ti yathāvuḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā sāmaṇerānaṃ vā vandanaṃ na sādiyati. ^b^Yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyatī^eb^ti attanā musāvādaṃ katvā dassitavassānurūpaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyati. ^b^Bhikkhuvassagaṇanādiko^eb^ti iminā na ekakammādikova idha saṃvāso nāmāti dasseti.

[03]^b^Rāja…pe… bhayenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^bhaya^eb^-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo ‘‘rājabhayena dubbhikkhabhayenā’’tiādinā ^a^V3.0234^ea^. ^b^Saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti, yāva so suddhamānaso^eb^ti rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgatāya so suddhamānaso yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāsetīti attho. Yo hi rājabhayādiṃ vinā kevalaṃ bhikkhū vañcetvā tehi saddhiṃ saṃvasitukāmatāya liṅgaṃ gaṇhāti, so asuddhacittatāya liṅgaggahaṇeneva theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hoti. Ayaṃ pana tādisena asuddhacittena bhikkhū vañcetukāmatāya abhāvato yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti, tāva theyyasaṃvāsako nāma na hoti. Teneva ‘‘rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgānaṃ ‘gihī maṃ samaṇoti jānantū’ti vañcanācitte satipi bhikkhūnaṃ vañcetukāmatāya abhāvā doso na jāto’’ti ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘vūpasantabhayatā ^a^M3.0258^ea^ idha suddhacittatā’’ti vadanti, evañca sati so vūpasantabhayo yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti, tāva theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti ayamattho viññāyati. Imasmiñca atthe viññāyamāne avūpasantabhayassa saṃvāsasādiyanepi theyyasaṃvāsakatā na hotīti āpajjeyya, na ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avūpasantabhayassa saṃvāsasādiyanepi atheyyasaṃvāsakatā dassitā. ^b^Sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattāni bhuñjanto^eb^ti ca iminā avūpasantatayenapi saṃvāsaṃ asādiyanteneva vasitabbanti dīpeti. Teneva ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ ‘‘yasmā vihāraṃ āgantvā saṅghikaṃ gaṇhantassa saṃvāsaṃ pariharituṃ dukkaraṃ, tasmā sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattāni bhuñjantoti idaṃ vutta’’nti, tasmā rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgatāyevettha suddhacittatāti gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattānī^eb^ti sabbasāmayikānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ katvā vīthicatukkādīsu ṭhapetvā dātabbabhattāni. ^b^Kāyaparihāriyānī^eb^ti kāyena pariharitabbāni. ^b^Abbhuggacchantī^eb^ti abhimukhaṃ gacchanti. ^b^Kammantānuṭṭhānenā^eb^ti kasigorakkhādikammakaraṇena. ^b^Tadeva pattacīvaraṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gacchatī^eb^ti cīvarāni nivāsanapārupanavasena ādāya pattañca aṃsakūṭe laggetvā vihāraṃ gacchati. ^b^Nāpi sayaṃ jānātī^eb^ti ‘‘yo evaṃ pabbajati, so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotī’’ti vā ‘‘evaṃ kātuṃ na labhatī’’ti vā ‘‘evaṃ pabbajito samaṇo na hotī’’ti vā na jānāti. ^b^Yo evaṃ pabbajati, so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotī^eb^ti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ. ^b^Anupasampannakāleyevā^eb^ti iminā upasampannakāle sutvā sacepi nāroceti, theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti dīpeti.

[03]^b^Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya…pe… theyyasaṃvāsako na hotī^eb^ti idaṃ bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa apariccattattā na liṅgathenako hoti, liṅgānurūpassa saṃvāsassa sāditattā nāpi saṃvāsathenako hotīti vuttaṃ. ^b^Eko bhikkhu kāsāye saussāhova odātaṃ nivāsetvā^eb^ti etthāpi idameva kāraṇaṃ ^a^V3.0235^ea^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Parato ^b^sāmaṇero saliṅge ṭhito^eb^tiādinā sāmaṇerassa vuttavidhānesupi atheyyasaṃvāsakapakkhe ayameva nayo. ^b^Bhikkhuniyāpi eseva nayo^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ ^b^‘‘sāpi hi gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānā’’^eb^tiādinā vibhāveti. ^b^Yo koci vuḍḍhapabbajito^eb^ti ^a^M3.0259^ea^ sāmaṇeraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Mahāpeḷādīsū^eb^ti etena gihisantakaṃ dassitaṃ. ^b^Sayaṃ sāmaṇerova…pe… theyyasaṃvāsako na hotī^eb^ti ettha kiñcāpi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti, pārājikaṃ pana āpajjatiyeva. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Theyyasaṃvāsakavatthukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Titthiyapakkantakakathāyaṃ ^b^tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatte titthiyapakkantako hotī^eb^ti ‘‘titthiyo bhavissāmī’’ti gatassa liṅgaggahaṇeneva tesaṃ laddhipi gahitāyeva hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Kenaci^eb^ pana ‘‘tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatte laddhiyā gahitāyapi aggahitāyapi titthiyapakkantako hotī’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi ‘‘titthiyo bhavissāmī’’ti gatassa liṅgasampaṭicchanato aññaṃ laddhiggahaṇaṃ nāma atthi. Liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva hi so gahitaladdhiko hoti. Teneva ^b^‘‘vīmaṃsanatthaṃ kusacīrādīni…pe… yāva na sampaṭicchati, tāva taṃ laddhi rakkhati. Sampaṭicchitamatte titthiyapakkantako hotī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Naggova ājīvakānaṃ upassayaṃ gacchati, padavāre padavāre dukkaṭa^eb^nti ‘‘ājīvako bhavissa’’nti asuddhacittena gamanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Naggena hutvā gamanapaccayāpi dukkaṭā na muccatiyeva. ^b^Kūṭavassaṃ gaṇento^eb^ti kūṭavassaṃ gaṇetvā saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantoti adhippāyo.
[06]Titthiyapakkantakakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^111^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tiracchānagatavatthu uttānameva.

[03]^b^112^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mātughātakādivatthūsu ^b^apavāhana^eb^nti apagamanaṃ, patikaraṇanti attho. Yathā samānajātikassa vikopane kammaṃ garutaraṃ, na tathā vijātikassāti āha ^b^‘‘manussitthibhūtā’’^eb^ti ^a^V3.0236^ea^. Puttasambandhena mātupitusamaññā ^a^M3.0260^ea^, dattakittimādivasenapi puttavohāro loke dissati, so ca kho pariyāyatoti nippariyāyasiddhataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘janikā mātā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yathā manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva kusaladhammānaṃ tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpatti yathā taṃ tiṇṇampi bodhisattānaṃ bodhittayanibbattiyaṃ, evaṃ manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva akusaladhammānampi tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpattīti āha ^b^‘‘sayampi manussajātikenevā’’^eb^ti. Cutianantaraṃ phalaṃ anantaraṃ nāma, tasmiṃ anantare niyuttaṃ, taṃnibbattanena anantarakaraṇasīlaṃ, anantarapayojanaṃ vā ānantariyaṃ, tena ^b^ānantariyena mātughātakakammena^eb^. Pitughātakepi yena manussabhūto janako pitā sayampi manussajātikeneva satā sañcicca jīvitā voropito, ayaṃ ānantariyena pitughātakakammena pitughātakotiādinā sabbaṃ veditabbanti āha ^b^‘‘pitughātakepi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti.

[03]Parivattitaliṅgampi (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 3.128; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.275; vibha. aṭṭha. 809) mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā jīvitā voropentassa ānantariyakammaṃ hotiyeva. Satipi hi liṅgaparivatte so eva ekakammanibbatto bhavaṅgappabandho jīvitindriyappabandho ca, nāññoti. Yo pana sayaṃ manusso tiracchānabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā, sayaṃ vā tiracchānabhūto manussabhūtaṃ, tiracchānabhūtoyeva vā tiracchānabhūtaṃ jīvitā voropeti, tassa kammaṃ ānantariyaṃ na hoti, bhāriyaṃ pana hoti, ānantariyaṃ āhacceva tiṭṭhati. Eḷakacatukkaṃ saṅgāmacatukkaṃ coracatukkañcettha kathetabbaṃ. ‘‘Eḷakaṃ māremī’’ti abhisandhināpi hi eḷakaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ manusso manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā mārento ānantariyaṃ phusati maraṇādhippāyeneva ānantariyavatthuno vikopitattā. Eḷakābhisandhinā pana mātāpitiaasandhinā vā eḷakaṃ mārento ānantariyaṃ na phusati ānantariyavatthuabhāvato. Mātāpitiabhisandhinā mātāpitaro mārento phusateva. Esa nayo itarasmimpi catukkadvaye. Yathā ca mātāpitūsu, evaṃ arahantepi etāni catukkāni veditabbāni. Sabbattha hi purimaṃ abhisandhicittaṃ appamāṇaṃ, vadhakacittaṃ pana tadārammaṇaṃ jīvitindriyañca ānantariyānānantarabhāve pamāṇaṃ. Katānantariyakammo ca ‘‘tassa kammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhissāmī’’ti sakalacakkavāḷaṃ mahācetiyappamāṇehi kañcanathūpehi pūretvāpi sakalacakkavāḷaṃ pūretvā nisinnassa ^a^M3.0261^ea^ bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvāpi buddhassa bhagavato saṅghāṭikaṇṇaṃ amuñcanto vicaritvāpi kāyassa bhedā nirayameva upapajjati, pabbajjañca na labhati.

[03]^b^115^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Icchamāna^eb^nti ^a^V3.0237^ea^ odātavatthavasanaṃ icchamānaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘gihibhāve sampaṭicchitamatteyevā’’^eb^ti. Saṅghabhedakakathāvitthāro parato āvi bhavissati. ^b^Catunnaṃ kammāna^eb^nti apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ. ^b^Duṭṭhacittenā^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti ^b^‘‘vadhakacittenā’’^eb^ti. Vadhakacetanāya hi dūsitacittaṃ idha duṭṭhacittaṃ nāma. ^b^Lohitaṃ uppādetī^eb^ti ettha tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya parūpakkamena cammacchedaṃ katvā lohitapaggharaṇaṃ nāma natthi, sarīrassa pana antoyeva ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati, āghātena pakuppamānaṃ sañcitaṃ hoti. Devadattena paviddhasilato bhijjitvā gatasakkhalikāpi tathāgatassa pādantaṃ pahari, pharasunā pahaṭo viya pādo antolohitoyeva ahosi. Jīvako pana tathāgatassa ruciyā satthakena cammaṃ chinditvā tamhā ṭhānā duṭṭhalohitaṃ nīharitvā phāsumakāsi, tenassa puññakammameva ahosi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘jīvako viyā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Atha ye parinibbute tathāgate cetiyaṃ bhindanti, bodhiṃ chindanti, dhātumhi upakkamanti, tesaṃ kiṃ hotīti? Bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ hoti ānantariyasadisaṃ. Sadhātukaṃ pana thūpaṃ vā paṭimaṃ vā bādhamānaṃ bodhisākhaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Sacepi tattha nilīnā sakuṇā cetiye vaccaṃ pātenti, chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Paribhogacetiyato hi sarīracetiyaṃ garutaraṃ. Cetiyavatthuṃ bhinditvā gacchante bodhimūlepi chinditvā harituṃ vaṭṭati. Yā pana bodhisākhā bodhigharaṃ bādhati, taṃ geharakkhaṇatthaṃ chindituṃ na labhati. Bodhiatthañhi gehaṃ, na gehatthāya bodhi. Āsanagharepi eseva nayo. Yasmiṃ pana āsanaghare dhātu nihitā hoti, tassa rakkhaṇatthāya bodhisākhaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Bodhijagganatthaṃ ojoharaṇasākhaṃ vā pūtiṭṭhānaṃ vā chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva, satthu rūpakāyapaṭijaggane viya puññampi hoti.
[06]Mātughātakādivatthukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^116^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ubhato^eb^^a^M3.0262^ea^^b^byañjanamassa atthīti ubhatobyañjanako^eb^ti iminā asamānādhikaraṇavisayo bāhiratthasamāsoyaṃ, purimapade ca vibhattialopoti dasseti. ^b^Byañjana^eb^nti cettha itthinimittaṃ purisanimittañca adhippetaṃ. Atha ubhatobyañjanakassa ekameva indriyaṃ, udāhu dveti? Ekameva ‘‘yassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? No. Yassa vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? No’’ti ^a^V3.0238^ea^ (yama. 3.indriyayamaka.188) ekasmiṃ santāne indriyadvayassa paṭisiddhattā, tañca kho itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthindriyaṃ, purisaubhatobyañjanakassa purisindriyaṃ. Yadi evaṃ dutiyabyañjanakassa abhāvo āpajjati. Indriyañhi byañjanakāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tañca tassa natthīti? Vuccate – na tassa indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ. Kasmā? Sadā abhāvato. Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa hi yadā itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati, tadā purisabyañjanaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, itthibyañjanaṃ paṭicchannaṃ guḷhaṃ hoti, tathā itarassa itaraṃ. Yadi ca tesaṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya, sadāpi byañjanadvayaṃ tiṭṭheyya, na pana tiṭṭhati, tasmā veditabbametaṃ ‘‘na tassa taṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ, kammasahāyaṃ pana rāgacittamevettha kāraṇa’’nti.

[03]Yasmā cassa ekameva indriyaṃ hoti, tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako sayampi gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, parampi gaṇhāpeti. Purisaubhatobyañjanako paraṃ gaṇhāpeti, sayaṃ pana na gaṇhāti. Yadi paṭisandhiyaṃ purisaliṅgaṃ, yadi paṭisandhiyaṃ itthiliṅganti ca paṭisandhiyaṃ liṅgasabbhāvo ^b^kurundiyaṃ^eb^vutto, so ca ayutto. Pavattiyaṃyeva hi itthiliṅgādīni samuṭṭhahanti, na paṭisandhiyaṃ. Paṭisandhiyaṃ pana indriyameva samuṭṭhāti, na liṅgādīni. Na ca indriyameva liṅganti sakkā vattuṃ indriyaliṅgānaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ^eb^ (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 632) –

[08]‘‘Itthattaṃ itthibhāvoti ubhayaṃ ekatthaṃ, itthisabhāvoti attho. Ayaṃ kammajo paṭisandhisamuṭṭhito. Itthiliṅgādi pana itthindriyaṃ paṭicca pavatte samuṭṭhitaṃ. Yathā bīje sati bījaṃ paṭicca bījapaccayā rukkho vaḍḍhitvā sākhāviṭapasampanno hutvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā ^a^M3.0263^ea^ tiṭṭhati, evameva itthibhāvasaṅkhāte itthindriye sati itthiliṅgādīni honti. Bījaṃ viya hi itthindriyaṃ, bījaṃ paṭicca vaḍḍhitvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā ṭhitarukkho viya itthindriyaṃ paṭicca itthiliṅgādīni pavatte samuṭṭhahanti. Tattha itthindriyaṃ na cakkhuviññeyyaṃ, manoviññeyyameva. Itthiliṅgādīni cakkhuviññeyyānipi manoviññeyyānipī’’ti.
[07]Tenevāha ^b^‘‘tattha vicāraṇakkamo vitthārato aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāya veditabbo’’^eb^ti.
[06]Ubhatobyañjanakavatthukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^117^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sikkhāpadaṃ^eb^^a^V3.0239^ea^^b^apaññattaṃ hotī^eb^ti idheva paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Upajjhaṃ aggāhāpetvā^eb^ti ‘‘upajjhāyo me, bhante, hohī’’ti evaṃ upajjhaṃ aggāhāpetvā. Kammavācāya pana upajjhāyakittanaṃ kataṃyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññathā ‘‘puggalaṃ na parāmasatī’’ti vuttakammavipattisambhavato kammaṃ kuppeyya, teneva ‘‘upajjhāyaṃ akittetvā’’ti avatvā ‘‘upajjhaṃ aggāhāpetvā’’icceva vuttaṃ. Yathā ca aparipuṇṇapattacīvarassa upasampādanakāle kammavācāya ‘‘paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara’’nti asantavatthuṃ kittetvā kammavācāya katāyapi upasampadā ruhati, evaṃ ‘‘ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho’’ti asantaṃ puggalaṃ kittetvā kevalaṃ santapadanīhārena kammavācāya katāya upasampadā ruhatiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘kammaṃ pana na kuppatī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Na, bhikkhave, anupajjhāyako upasampādetabbo, yo upasampādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti ettakameva vatvā ‘‘so ca puggalo anupasampanno’’ti avuttattā kammavipattilakkhaṇassa ca asambhavato ^b^‘‘taṃ na gahetabba’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Pañcavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ paṇḍakapañcamo kammaṃ kareyya, akammaṃ na ca karaṇīya’’ntiādivacanato (mahāva. 390) paṇḍakādīnampi ubhatobyañjanakapariyantānaṃ gaṇapūrakabhāveyeva kammaṃ kuppati, na aññathāti āha ^b^‘‘ubhatobyañjanakupajjhāyapariyosānesupi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti.
[06]Anupajjhāyakādivatthukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^118^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aññe ^a^M3.0264^ea^ vā bhikkhū dātukāmā hontīti sambandho. ^b^Anāmaṭṭhapiṇḍapāta^eb^nti aggahitaaggaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ. ^b^Sāmaṇerabhāgasamako āmisabhāgo^eb^ti ettha kiñcāpi sāmaṇerānaṃ āmisabhāgassa samakameva diyyamānattā visuṃ sāmaṇerabhāgo nāma natthi, heṭṭhā gacchantaṃ pana bhattaṃ kadāci mandaṃ bhaveyya, tasmā upari aggahetvā sāmaṇerapāḷiyāva gahetvā dātabboti adhippāyo. Niyatapabbajjasseva cāyaṃ bhāgo dīyati. Teneva ^b^‘‘apakkaṃ patta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.
[06]Apattakādivatthukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^119^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajapadake^eb^ti ^a^V3.0240^ea^ ajapadasaṇṭhāne padese. ^b^Brahmujugatto^eb^ti brahmā viya ujugatto. ^b^Avaseso satto^eb^ti iminā lakkhaṇena rahitasatto. Etena ṭhapetvā mahāpurisaṃ cakkavattiñca itare sattā khujjapakkhikāti dasseti. Yebhuyyena hi sattā khandhe kaṭiyaṃ jāṇūsūti tīsu ṭhānesu namanti. Te kaṭiyaṃ namantā pacchato namanti, itaresu dvīsu ṭhānesu namantā purato namanti. Dīghasarīrā pana ekena passena vaṅkā honti, eke mukhaṃ unnāmetvā nakkhattāni gaṇayantā viya caranti, eke appamaṃsalohitā sūlasadisā honti, eke purato pabbhārā honti, pavedhamānā gacchanti. ^b^Parivaṭumo^eb^ti samantato vaṭṭalo.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhisirācammasarīro^eb^ti aṭṭhisirācammamattasarīro. ^b^Kappasīso^eb^ti dvidhābhūtasīso. ^b^Kekaro^eb^ti tiriyaṃ passanto. ^b^‘‘Udakatārakā^eb^ nāma udakapubbuḷa’’nti ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu ^eb^vuttaṃ. ^b^Akkhitārakā^eb^ti akkhibhaṇḍakā. ^b^Nippakhumakkhī^eb^ti akkhidalalomehi virahitaakkhiko. Pakhuma-saddo hi loke akkhidalalomesu niruḷho. ^b^Paṭaṅgamaṇḍūko^eb^ nāma mahāmukhamaṇḍūko. ^b^Eḷamukho^eb^ti niccapaggharaṇakalālamukho. ^b^Sabbañceta^eb^nti ‘‘kacchugatto vā’’tiādiṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Vātaṇḍiko^eb^ti aṇḍakesu vuddhirogena samannāgato. ^b^Vikaṭo^eb^ti tiriyaṃ gamanapādehi samannāgato, yassa ca caṅkamato ^a^M3.0265^ea^ jāṇukā bahi gacchanti. ^b^Paṇho^eb^ti pacchato parivattapādehi samannāgato, yassa caṅkamato jāṇukā anto pavisanti.

[03]Kudaṇḍapādatāya kāraṇaṃ vibhāveti ^b^‘‘majjhe saṅkuṭitapādattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Agge saṅkuṭitapādattā^eb^ti kuṇḍapādatāya kāraṇanidassanaṃ. Kuṇḍapādasseva gamanasabhāvaṃ vibhāveti ^b^‘‘piṭṭhipādaggena caṅkamanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mammana^eb^nti khalitavacanaṃ. Yo ekameva akkharaṃ catupañcakkhattuṃ vadati, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
[06]Hatthacchinnādivatthukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^120^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nissayapaṭisaṃyuttavatthūsu bhikkhūhi samāno sīlādiguṇabhāgo assāti bhikkhusabhāgo, tassa bhāvo ^b^bhikkhusabhāgatā. Dve tīṇi divasāni vasitvā gantukāmena anissitena^eb^^a^V3.0241^ea^^b^vasitabba^eb^nti ettha ‘‘yāva bhikkhusabhāgataṃ jānāmī’’ti ābhogaṃ vināpi anissitena vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. Bhikkhusabhāgataṃ pana jānanto ‘‘sve gamissāmi, kiṃ me nissayenā’’ti aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapetuṃ na labhati. ‘‘Purāruṇā uṭṭhahitvāva gamissāmī’’ti ābhogena sayantassa sace aruṇo uggacchati, vaṭṭati. ^b^‘‘Sattāhaṃ vasissāmī’’ti ālayaṃ karontena pana nissayo gahetabbo^eb^ti ‘‘sattāhamattaṃ vasissāmi, kiṃ bhikkhusabhāgatājānanenā’’ti jānane dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā vasituṃ na labhati, bhikkhusabhāgataṃ upaparikkhitvā nissayo gahetabboti attho.

[03]^b^121^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Antarāmagge vissamanto vā…pe… anāpattī^eb^ti asati nissayadāyake anāpatti. ^b^Tassa nissāyā^eb^ti pāḷianurūpato vuttaṃ, taṃ nissāyāti attho. ^b^Sace pana āsāḷhīmāse…pe… tattha gantabba^eb^nti ettha sace so vassūpanāyikāya āsannāya gantukāmo suṇāti ‘‘asuko mahāthero āgamissatī’’ti, tañce āgameti, vaṭṭati. Āgamentasseva ^a^M3.0266^ea^ ce vassūpanāyikadivaso hoti, hotu, gantabbaṃ tattha, yattha nissayadāyakaṃ labhati. Keci pana ‘‘sace so gacchanto jīvitantarāyaṃ brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā passati, tattheva vasitabba’’nti vadanti.

[03]^b^122^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato’’ti nāmakittanassa anussāvanāya āgatattā ^b^‘‘nāhaṃ ussahāmi therassa nāmaṃ gahetu’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ, ‘‘āyasmato pippalissa upasampadāpekkho’’ti evaṃ nāmaṃ gahetuṃ na ussahāmīti attho. ‘‘Gottenapi anussāvetu’’nti vacanato yena vohārena voharati, tena vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. ‘‘Konāmo te upajjhāyo’’ti puṭṭhenapi gottameva nāmaṃ katvā vattabbanti siddhaṃ hoti, tasmā catubbidhesu nāmesu yena kenaci nāmena anussāvanā kātabbāti vadanti. Ekassa bahūni nāmāni honti, tattha ekaṃ nāmaṃ ñattiyā, ekaṃ anussāvanāya kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, atthato byañjanato ca abhinnāhi anussāvanāhi bhavitabbanti. Kiñcāpi ‘‘itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato’’ti pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘āyasmato’’ti padaṃ pacchā vuttaṃ, kammavācāpāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassā’’ti paṭhamaṃ likhitanti taṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttanti na paccetabbaṃ. Pāḷiyañhi ‘‘itthannāmo itthannāmassa ^a^V3.0242^ea^ āyasmato’’ti atthamattaṃ dassitaṃ, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ avuttopi ‘‘ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassā’’ti kammavācāpāḷiyaṃ payogo dassito. ‘‘Na me diṭṭho ito pubbe iccāyasmā sāriputto’’ti ca ‘‘āyasmā sāriputto atthakusalo’’ti ca paṭhamaṃ ‘‘āyasmā’’ti payogassa dassanatoti vadanti. Katthaci ‘‘āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassā’’ti vatvā katthaci kevalaṃ ‘‘buddharakkhitassā’’ti sāveti, sāvanaṃ hāpetīti na vuccati nāmassa ahāpitattāti eke. Sace katthaci ‘‘āyasmato buddharakkhitassā’’ti vatvā katthaci ‘‘buddharaakhatassāyasmato’’ti sāveti, pāṭhānurūpattā khettameva otiṇṇantipi eke. Byañjanabhedappasaṅgato anussāvanānaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Sace pana sabbaṭṭhānepi eteneva pakārena vadati, vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^123^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekānussāvane^eb^ti ^a^M3.0267^ea^ ettha ekato anussāvanaṃ etesanti ^b^ekānussāvanā^eb^ti asamānādhikaraṇavisayo bāhiratthasamāsoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘dve ekatoanussāvane’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^ekato^eb^ti ekakkhaṇeti attho, vibhattialopena cāyaṃ niddeso. ^b^Purimanayeneva ekatoanussāvane kātu^eb^nti ‘‘ekena ekassa, aññena itarassā’’tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena dvīhi vā tīhi vā ācariyehi ekena vā ekatoanussāvane kātuṃ.
[03]^b^126^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyatīti upajjhā^eb^ti iminā upajjhāyasaddasamānattho upajjhāsaddopīti dasseti.

[03]^b^130^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sambhoge^eb^ti dhammasambhoge āmisasambhoge ca. ^b^Anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāse^eb^ti ettha ca ayamadhippāyo – yasmā ayaṃ osāraṇakammassa katattā pakatattaṭṭhāne ṭhito, tasmā na ukkhittakena saddhiṃ sambhogādipaccayā pācittiyaṃ, nāpi alajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ alajjīlakkhaṇānupapattito. Yo hi ucchurasakasaṭānaṃ sattāhakālikayāvajīvikattā vaṭṭati vikāle ucchu khāditunti saññaṃ uppādetvā taṃ khāditvā tappaccayā pācittiyaṃ na passati ^a^V3.0243^ea^ ‘‘vaṭṭatī’’ti tathāsaññitāya, yo vā pana āpattimāpannabhāvaṃ paṭijānitvā ‘‘na paṭikaromī’’ti abhinivisati, ayaṃ –
[21]‘‘Sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjati, āpattiṃ parigūhati;
[22]Agatigamanañca gacchati, ediso vuccati alajjīpuggalo’’ti. (pari. 359) –

[07]Vuttalakkhaṇe apatanato alajjī nāma na hoti. Tasmā yathā pubbe yāva ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ, tāva tena saddhiṃ sambhoge saṃvāse ca anāpatti, evamidhāpīti sabbathā anāpattiṭṭhāneyeva anāpatti vuttāti veditabbaṃ ^a^M3.0268^ea^. Na hi bhagavā alajjinā saddhiṃ sambhogapaccayā āpattisambhave sati ‘‘anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāse’’ti vadati. Tato yamettha kenaci ‘‘anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāse’’ti iminā pācittiyena anāpatti vuttā, ‘‘alajjīparibhogapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ pana āpajjatiyevā’’ti vatvā bahudhā papañcitaṃ, na taṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
[06]Mahākhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^132^eb^^b^.^eb^ Uposathakkhandhake ^a^M3.0269^ea^^a^V3.0244^ea^ taranti plavanti ettha bālāti ^b^titthaṃ. Ito^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane laddhito. ^b^Taṃ kathentī^eb^ti ‘‘imasmiṃ nāma divase muhutte vā idaṃ kattabba’’ntiādinā kathenti.

[03]^b^134^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Suṇātu me bhante’’tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. nidānavaṇṇanā) vitthārato āgatamevāti na idha vitthārayissāma, atthikehi pana tatoyeva gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^135^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āpajjitvā vā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti ettha ārocitāpi āpatti asantī nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. nidānavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ‘‘yassa pana evaṃ anāpannā vā āpatti āpajjitvā ca pana vuṭṭhitā vā desitā vā ārocitā vā, tassa sā āpatti asantī nāma hotī’’ti. Musāvādo nāma vacībhedapaccayā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘na musāvādalakkhaṇenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhagavato pana vacanenā^eb^ti sampajānamusāvāde kiṃ hoti? ‘‘Dukkaṭaṃ hotī’’ti iminā vacanena. ^b^Vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā āpatti hotī^eb^ti yasmā yassa bhikkhuno adhammikāya paṭiññāya tuṇhībhūtassa nisinnassa manodvāre āpatti nāma natthi, yasmā pana āvi kātabbaṃ na āvi akāsi, tenassa vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā āpatti hoti.

[03]^b^Vācā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0245^ea^ vācāya, ya-kāralopenāyaṃ niddeso. Kenaci manujena vācāya anālapantoti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Giraṃ no ca pare bhaṇeyyā^eb^ti ‘‘ime sossantī’’ti parapuggale sandhāya saddampi na nicchāreyya. ^b^Āpajjeyya vācasika^eb^nti vācato samuṭṭhitaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjeyya.

[03]^b^Antarāyakaro^eb^ti vippaṭisāravatthutāya pāmojjādisambhavaṃ nivāretvā paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya antarāyakaro. ^b^Tassa bhikkhuno phāsu hotī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0270^ea^ avippaṭisāramūlakānaṃ pāmojjādīnaṃ vasena tassa bhikkhuno sukhā paṭipadā sampajjatīti attho.
[06]Sannipātānujānanādikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^138^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Itaropī^eb^ti suddhapaṃsupabbatādiṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Hatthippamāṇo nāma pabbato^eb^ heṭṭhimakoṭiyā aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanubbedho. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ekena na vaṭṭati, tasmā. ^b^Dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇatā^eb^ thūlatāya gahetabbā, na tulagaṇanāya. ^b^Antosāramissakāna^eb^nti antosārarukkhehi missakānaṃ. ^b^Sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇo^eb^ti sīhaḷadīpe lekhanadaṇḍappamāṇoti vadanti, so ca kaniṭṭhaṅguliparimāṇoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Eta^eb^nti navamūlasākhāniggamanaṃ. ^b^Parabhāge kittetuṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti bahi nikkhamitvā ṭhitesu aṭṭhasu maggesu ekissā disāya ekaṃ, aparāya ekanti evaṃ catūsu ṭhānesu kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^Yattha katthaci uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā antaravāsako temiyatī^eb^ti sikkhākaraṇīyaṃ āgatalakkhaṇena timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā antaravāsakaṃ anukkhipitvā titthena vā atitthena vā uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā ekadvaṅgulamattampi antaravāsako temiyati. Bhikkhuniyā eva gahaṇañcettha bhikkhunīvibhaṅge bhikkhuniyā vasena nadīlakkhaṇassa pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā teneva nayena dassanatthaṃ kataṃ. ^b^Sīmaṃ bandhantānaṃ nimittaṃ hotī^eb^ti ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇā nadī samuddaṃ vā pavisatu taḷākaṃ vā, pabhavato paṭṭhāya nimittaṃ hoti. ^b^Ajjhottharitvā āvaraṇaṃ pavattatiyevā^eb^ti āvaraṇaṃ ajjhottharitvā sandatiyeva. ^b^Appavattamānā^eb^ti asandamānudakā. Āvaraṇañhi patvā nadiyā yattake padese udakaṃ asandamānaṃ santiṭṭhati, tattha nadīnimittaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Upari sandamānaṭṭhāneyeva vaṭṭati, asandamānaṭṭhāne pana udakanimittaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Ṭhitameva hi udakanimitte vaṭṭati, na sandamānaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘pavattanaṭṭhāne nadīnimittaṃ, appavattanaṭṭhāne udakanimittaṃ^eb^^a^V3.0246^ea^^b^kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nadiṃ bhinditvā^eb^ti mātikāmukhadvārena nadīkūlaṃ bhinditvā. ^b^Ukkhepima^eb^nti kūpato viya ukkhipitvā gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0271^ea^ tikoṇaracchāsaṇṭhānā. ^b^Mudiṅgasaṇṭhānā^eb^ti mudiṅgabherī viya majjhe vitthatā ubhosu koṭīsu saṅkoṭitā hoti. ^b^Upacāraṃ ṭhapetvā^eb^ti pacchā sīmaṃ bandhantānaṃ sīmāya okāsaṃ ṭhapetvā. ^b^Antonimittagatehi panā^eb^ti ekassa gāmassa upaḍḍhaṃ anto kattukāmatāya sati sabbesaṃ āgamane payojanaṃ natthīti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Āgantabba^eb^nti ca sāmīcivasena vuttaṃ, nāyaṃ niyamo ‘‘āgantabbamevā’’ti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘āgamanampi anāgamanampi vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. Abaddhāya hi sīmāya nānāgāmakhettānaṃ nānāsīmasabhāvattā tesaṃ anāgamanepi vaggakammaṃ na hoti, tasmā anāgamanampi vaṭṭati. Baddhāya pana sīmāya ekasīmabhāvato puna aññasmiṃ kamme kariyamāne anto sīmagatehi āgantabbamevāti āha ^b^‘‘avippavāsasīmā…pe… āgantabba’’^eb^nti. Nimittakittanakāle asodhitāyapi sīmāya nevatthi doso nimittakittanassa apalokanādīsu aññatarābhāvato.

[03]Bhaṇḍukammāpucchanaṃ sandhāya ^b^pabbajjā^eb^-gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Sukhakaraṇattha^eb^nti sabbesaṃ sannipātanaparissamaṃ pahāya appatarehi sukhakaraṇatthaṃ. ^b^Ekavīsati bhikkhū gaṇhātī^eb^ti vīsativaggakaraṇīyaparamattā saṅghakammassa kammārahena saddhiṃ ekavīsati bhikkhū gaṇhāti. Idañca nisinnānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhimantato hi yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ sakkonti, tattake padese sīmaṃ bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Na sakkhissantī^eb^ti avippavāsasīmāya baddhabhāvaṃ asallakkhetvā ‘‘samānasaṃvāsakameva samūhanissāmā’’ti vāyamantā na sakkhissanti. Baddhāya hi avippavāsasīmāya taṃ asamūhanitvā ‘‘samānasaṃvāsakasīmaṃ samūhanissāmā’’ti katāyapi kammavācāya asamūhatāva hoti sīmā. Paṭhamañhi avippavāsaṃ samūhanitvā pacchā sīmā samūhanitabbā. Ekaratanappamāṇā suviññeyyatarā hotīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ekaratanappamāṇā vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. Ekaṅgulamattāpi sīmantarikā vaṭṭatiyeva. Tattakenapi hi sīmā asambhinnāva hoti.

[03]^b^Avasesanimittānī^eb^ti mahāsīmāya bāhirapasse nimittāni. Khaṇḍasīmato paṭṭhāya bandhanaṃ āciṇṇaṃ, āciṇṇakaraṇeneva ca sammoho na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘khaṇḍasīmatova paṭṭhāya bandhitabbā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kuṭigehe^eb^ti kuṭighare, bhūmighareti attho. ^b^Udukkhala^eb^nti khuddakāvāṭaṃ. ^b^Nimittaṃ na kātabba^eb^nti taṃ rājiṃ vā udukkhalaṃ vā nimittaṃ na kātabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Heṭṭhā^eb^^a^M3.0272^ea^^a^V3.0247^ea^^b^na otaratī^eb^ti bhittito oraṃ nimittāni ṭhapetvā kittitattā heṭṭhā ākāsappadesaṃ na otarati. ^b^Heṭṭhāpi otaratī^eb^ti sace heṭṭhā antobhittiyaṃ ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ okāso hoti, otarati. Otaramānā ca uparisīmappamāṇena na otarati, samantā bhittippamāṇena otarati. ^b^Otaraṇānotaraṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabba^eb^nti sace heṭṭhā ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ okāso hoti, otarati. No ce, na otaratīti adhippāyo. ^b^Sabbo pāsādo sīmaṭṭho hotī^eb^ti uparimatalena saddhiṃ ekābaddhabhittiko vā hotu mā vā, sabbopi pāsādo sīmaṭṭhova hoti.

[03]^b^Tālamūlakapabbate^eb^ti tālamūlasadise pabbate. So ca heṭṭhā mahanto hutvā anupubbena tanuko hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Paṇavasaṇṭhāno^eb^ majjhe tanuko hoti mūle agge ca vitthato. ^b^Heṭṭhā vā majjhe vā^eb^ti mudiṅgasaṇṭhānassa heṭṭhā paṇavasaṇṭhānassa majjhe. ^b^Ākāsapabbhāra^eb^nti bhittiyā aparikkhittapabbhāraṃ. ^b^Antoleṇaṃ hotī^eb^ti pabbatassa anto leṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Sīmāmāḷake^eb^ti khaṇḍasīmāmāḷake. ^b^Mahāsīmaṃ sodhetvā vā kammaṃ kātabba^eb^nti mahāsīmagatā bhikkhū hatthapāsaṃ vā ānetabbā, sīmato vā bahi kātabbāti adhippāyo. ^b^Gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ pana ‘‘mahāsīmagatehi bhikkhūhi taṃ sākhaṃ vā pārohaṃ vā anāmasitvā ṭhātabbanti adhippāyo’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Purimanayepī^eb^ti khaṇḍasīmāya uṭṭhahitvā mahāsīmāya oṇatarukkhepi. ^b^Ukkhipāpetvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti khaṇḍasīmāya anto ṭhitattā rukkhassa tattha ṭhito hatthapāsaṃyeva ānetabboti ukkhipāpetvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^140^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pārayatī^eb^ti ajjhottharati. ^b^Pārā^eb^ti sīmāpekkho itthiliṅganiddeso. ^b^Assā^eb^ti bhaveyya. Idhādhippetanāvāya pamāṇaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘yā sabbantimena paricchedena…pe… tayo jane vahatī’’^eb^ti. Iminā ca vuttappamāṇato khuddakā nāvā vijjamānāpi idha asantapakkhaṃ bhajatīti dīpeti. Avassaṃ labbhaneyyā dhuvanāvāva hotīti sambandho. Rukkhaṃ chinditvā katoti pāṭhaseso. ^b^Paratīre sammukhaṭṭhāne^eb^ti orimatīre sabbapariyantanimittassa sammukhaṭṭhāne. ^b^Sabbanimittānaṃ anto ṭhite bhikkhū hatthapāsagate katvā^eb^ti ettha sace ekaṃ gāmakhettaṃ hoti, ubhosu tīresu sabbanimittānaṃ anto ṭhite bhikkhū hatthapāsagate katvā ^a^M3.0273^ea^ sammannitabbā. Nānāgāmakkhettaṃ ce, samānasaṃvāsakasīmābandhanakāle anāgantumpi vaṭṭati. Avippavāsasīmāsammutiyaṃ pana āgantabbameva. Yasmā ubhosu tīresu nimittakittanamattena dīpako saṅgahito nāma na hoti, tasmā dīpakepi nimittāni visuṃ kittetabbānevāti āha ^b^‘‘dīpakassa^eb^^a^V3.0248^ea^^b^orimante ca pārimante ca nimittaṃ kittetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dīpakasikhara^eb^nti dīpakamatthakaṃ. ^b^Pabbatasaṇṭhānā^eb^ti dīpakassa ekato adhikatarattā vuttaṃ.
[06]Sīmānujānanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^142^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vatthuvasena vutta^eb^nti ‘‘mayañcamhā asammatāya bhūmiyā nisinnā pātimokkhaṃ assumhā’’ti vatthumhi pātimokkhasavanassa āgatattā vuttaṃ. ^b^Uposathappamukhaṃ^eb^ nāma uposathāgārassa sammukhaṭṭhānaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘paṭhamaṃ nimittā kittetabbā’’ti ettakameva vatvā sīmāsammutiyaṃ viya ‘‘pabbatanimittaṃ pāsāṇanimitta’’ntiādinā visesetvā nimittānaṃ adassitattā ^b^‘‘khuddakāni vā…pe… yāni kānici nimittānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti iminā sambandho.

[03]^b^144^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Assā^eb^ti bhikkhunisaṅghassa. ^b^Dvepi sīmāyo^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ vuttā avippavāsasīmā samānasaṃvāsakasīmā ca. ^b^Na kammavācaṃ vaggaṃ karontī^eb^ti kammavācaṃ na bhindanti, kammaṃ na kopentīti adhippāyo. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā’’ti ettha. ^b^Gāmañca gāmūpacārañca na ottharatī^eb^ti ‘‘ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā’’ti vuttattā. ^b^Sīmāsaṅkhyameva gacchatī^eb^ti avippavāsasīmāsaṅkhaṃ gacchati. ^b^Ekampi kulaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ vā^eb^ti abhinavakatagehesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ ekampi kulaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ atthi. ^b^Agataṃ vā^eb^ti porāṇakagāme aññesu gehāni chaḍḍetvā gatesu ekampi kulaṃ agataṃ atthi.

[03]^b^Avippavāsasīmā na samūhantabbā^eb^ti mahāsīmaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Nirāsaṅkaṭṭhānesu ṭhatvā^eb^ti cetiyaṅgaṇādīnaṃ khaṇḍasīmāya anokāsattā vuttaṃ. Khaṇḍasīmañhi bandhantā tādisaṃ ṭhānaṃ pahāya aññasmiṃ vivitte okāse bandhanti ^a^M3.0274^ea^. ^b^Appeva nāma samūhanituṃ sakkhissantī^eb^ti avippavāsasīmaṃyeva samūhanituṃ sakkhissanti, na khaṇḍasīmaṃ. ^b^Paṭibandhituṃ pana na sakkhissantevā^eb^ti khaṇḍasīmāya aññātattā na sakkhissanti. ^b^Na samūhanitabbā^eb^ti khaṇḍasīmaṃ ajānantehi ^a^V3.0249^ea^ na samūhanitabbā. Uposathassa visuṃ gahitattā avasesakammavasena samānasaṃvāsatā veditabbā.

[03]^b^147^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aparicchinnāyā^eb^ti baddhasīmāvasena akataparicchedāya. ^b^Yena kenaci khaṇitvā akato^eb^ti antamaso tiracchānenapi khaṇitvā akato. ^b^Tassa antohatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhito kammaṃ kopetī^eb^ti iminā bahiparicchedato yattha katthaci ṭhito kammaṃ na kopetīti dīpeti. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. nidānavaṇṇanā) ‘‘paricchedabbhantare hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitopi paricchedato bahi aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopeti, idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhāna’’nti, tattha ‘‘aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopetī’’ti idaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upalabbhati. Yadi cetaṃ dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃ uposathādikammakaraṇādhikāre vuttattā udakukkhepato bahi aññaṃ udakukkhepaṃ anatikkamitvā uposathādikaraṇatthaṃ ṭhito saṅgho sīmāsambhedasambhavato kammaṃ kopetīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ siyā, evaṃ sati yujjeyya. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsaniyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ ‘‘aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedanti dutiyaṃ udakukkhepaṃ anatikkantopi kopeti. Kasmā? Attano udakukkhepasīmāya paresaṃ udakukkhepasīmāya ajjhotthaṭattā sīmāsambhedo hoti, tasmā kopetī’’ti. ‘‘Idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhāna’’nti ca iminā adhippāyena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ sabbāsupi aṭṭhakathāsu sīmāsambhedassa anicchitattā. Teneva hi ‘‘attano ca aññesañca udakukkhepaparicchedassa antarā añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikatthāya ṭhapetabbo’’ti vuttaṃ. Aññe panettha aññathāpi papañcenti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sabbattha saṅgho nisīdatī^eb^ti hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā nisīdati. ^b^Udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ natthī^eb^ti yasmā sabbopi nadīpadeso bhikkhūhi ajjhotthaṭo ^a^M3.0275^ea^, tasmā samantato nadiyā abhāvā udakukkhepe payojanaṃ natthi. Udakukkhepappamāṇā sīmantarikā suviññeyyatarā hoti, sīmāsambhedasaṅkā na ca siyāti sāmīcidassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikatthāya ṭhapetabbo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yattakena pana sīmāsambhedo na hoti, tattakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Tenevāhu porāṇā ‘‘yattakena sīmāsaṅkaro na hoti, tattakampi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti. ^b^Ūnakaṃ pana na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti idampi udakukkhepasīmāya parisavasena vaḍḍhanato sīmāsambhedasaṅkā siyāti taṃnivāraṇatthameva vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Gacchantiyā^eb^^a^V3.0250^ea^^b^pana nāvāya kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha udakukkhepamanatikkamitvā parivattamānāya kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Sīmaṃ vā sodhetvā^eb^ti ettha ^b^sīmasodhanaṃ^eb^ nāma gāmasīmādīsu ṭhitānaṃ hatthapāsānayanādi. ^b^‘‘Nadiṃ vināsetvā taḷākaṃ karontī’’^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti ^b^‘‘heṭṭhā pāḷi baddhā’’^eb^ti, heṭṭhānadiṃ āvaritvā pāḷi baddhāti attho. ^b^Chaḍḍitamodaka^eb^nti taḷākarakkhaṇatthaṃ ekamantena chaḍḍitamudakaṃ. ^b^Deve avassante^eb^ti dubbuṭṭhikāle vassānepi deve avassante. ^b^Uppatitvā^eb^ti uttaritvā. ^b^Gāmanigamasīmaṃ ottharitvā pavattatī^eb^ti vuttappakāre vassakāle cattāro māse abbocchinnā pavattati. ^b^Vihārasīma^eb^nti baddhasīmaṃ sandhāya vadati.

[03]^b^Agamanapathe^eb^ti yattha tadaheva gantvā paccāgantuṃ na sakkā hoti, tādise padese araññasīmāsaṅkhameva gacchatīti sattabbhantarasīmaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti macchabandhānaṃ. ^b^Gamanapariyantassa orato^eb^ti gamanapariyantassa orimabhāge dīpakaṃ pabbatañca sandhāya vuttaṃ, na samuddappadesaṃ.

[03]^b^148^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapā^eb^ti iminā aññamaññassa āsannataṃ dīpeti. ^b^Baddhā hotī^eb^ti pacchimadisābhāge sīmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Tassā padesa^eb^nti yattha ṭhatvā bhikkhūhi kammaṃ kātuṃ sakkā hoti, tādisaṃ padesaṃ. Yattha pana ṭhitehi kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā hoti, tādisaṃ padesaṃ antokaritvā bandhantā sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindanti nāma. ^b^Dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ nimittaṃ hotī^eb^ti nimittassa sīmato bāhirattā sīmāsambhedo na hotīti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sīmāsaṅkaraṃ karotī^eb^ti vaḍḍhitvā sīmappadesaṃ paviṭṭhe dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ gataṭṭhānassa duviññeyyattā vuttaṃ, na pana tattha kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ. Na hi sīmā tattakena ^a^M3.0276^ea^ asīmā hoti, dve pana sīmā pacchā vaḍḍhitena rukkhena ajjhotthaṭattā ekābaddhā honti, tasmā ekattha ṭhatvā kammaṃ karontehi itaraṃ sodhetvā kātabbaṃ.
[06]Gāmasīmādikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^149^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Adhammena vaggaṃ uposathakamma^eb^nti ettha yattha cattāro vasanti, tattha pātimokkhuddeso anuññāto. Yattha dve vā tayo vā vasanti, tattha pārisuddhiuposatho. Idha pana ^a^V3.0251^ea^ tathā akatvā catunnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne pārisuddhiuposathassa katattā tiṇṇaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne ca pātimokkhassa uddiṭṭhattā ‘‘adhammenā’’ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā sabbeva na sannipatiṃsu, chandapārisuddhi ca saṅghamajjhaṃyeva āgacchati, na gaṇamajjhaṃ, tasmā ‘‘vagga’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^150^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evametaṃ dhārayāmī^eb^ti ‘‘sutā kho panāyasmantehī’’ti ettha ‘‘evametaṃ dhārayāmī’’ti vatvā ‘‘uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ, sutā kho panāyasmantehi cattāro pārājikā dhammā’’ti vattabbaṃ. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. nidānavaṇṇanā) ‘‘tatthāyasmante pucchāmi kaccittha parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi…pe… tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti vatvā ‘uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna’ntiādinā nayena avasese sutena sāvite uddiṭṭho hotī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sutenā^eb^ti sutapadena. ^b^Savarabhaya^eb^nti vanacarakabhayaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aṭavimanussabhaya’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabba’’nti vacanato nidānuddese aniṭṭhite sutena sāvetabbaṃ nāma natthīti āha ^b^‘‘dutiyādīsu uddesesū’’^eb^ti. Uddiṭṭhauddesāpekkhañhi avasesaggahaṇaṃ, tasmā nidāne uddiṭṭhe pārājikuddesādīsu yasmiṃ vippakate antarāyo uppajjati, tena saddhiṃ avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Tīhipi^eb^^a^M3.0277^ea^^b^vidhīhī^eb^ti osāraṇakathanasarabhaññehi. Ettha ca atthaṃ bhaṇitukāmatāya suttassa osāraṇā ^b^osāraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. Tasseva atthappakāsanā ^b^kathanaṃ^eb^ nāma. Suttassa tadatthassa vā sarena bhaṇanaṃ ^b^sarabhaññaṃ^eb^ nāma. ^b^Sajjhāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti ‘‘sajjhāyaṃ karomī’’ti cittaṃ uppādetvā. ^b^Osāretvā pana kathentenā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ ussāretvā pacchā atthaṃ kathentena. ^b^Manussānaṃ pana ‘‘bhaṇāhī’’ti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha uccatare nisinnenapi manussānaṃ bhaṇāhīti visesetvāyeva vattuṃ vaṭṭati, avisesetvā pana na vaṭṭati. ^b^Sajjhāyaṃ karontenā^eb^ti yattha katthaci nisīditvā sajjhāyaṃ karontena. ^b^Thero^eb^ti yo koci attanā vuḍḍhataro. ^b^Ekaṃ āpucchitvā^eb^ti ekaṃ vuḍḍhataraṃ āpucchitvā. ^b^Aparo āgacchatī^eb^ti aparo tatopi vuḍḍhataro āgacchati.
[06]Pātimokkhuddesakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^155^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Codanāvatthu^eb^^a^V3.0252^ea^ nāma ekaṃ nagaraṃ. ^b^Saṅghauposathādibhedena navavidha^eb^nti saṅghe uposatho gaṇe uposatho puggale uposathoti evaṃ kārakavasena tayo, suttuddeso pārisuddhiuposatho adhiṭṭhānuposathoti evaṃ kattabbākāravasena tayo, cātuddasiko pannarasiko sāmaggīuposathoti evaṃ divasavasena tayoti navavidhaṃ. ^b^Catubbidhaṃ uposathakamma^eb^nti adhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, adhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, dhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, dhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammanti evaṃ catubbidhampi uposathakammaṃ. ^b^Duvidhaṃ pātimokkha^eb^nti bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ bhikkhunīpātimokkhanti duvidhaṃ pātimokkhaṃ. ^b^Navavidhaṃ pātimokkhuddesa^eb^nti bhikkhūnaṃ pañca uddesā, bhikkhunīnaṃ ṭhapetvā aniyatuddesaṃ avasesā cattāroti navavidhaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ.
[03]^b^158-161^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samannāharathā^eb^ti sallakkhetha. ^b^Pariyesitabbānī^eb^ti bhikkhācārena pariyesitabbāni.
[03]^b^163^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Utuvasseyevā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0278^ea^ hemantagimhesuyeva.

[03]^b^164^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yena kenaci aṅgapaccaṅgena viññāpetī^eb^ti manasā cintetvā hatthappayogādinā yena kenaci viññāpeti. ^b^Saṅgho nappahotī^eb^ti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ antarā hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhātuṃ nappahoti. ^b^Itarā pana biḷālasaṅkhalikapārisuddhi nāmā^eb^ti ettha keci vadanti ‘‘biḷālasaṅkhalikā baddhāva hoti antogehe eva sampayojanattā, yathā sā na katthaci gacchati, tathā sāpi na gacchatīti adhippāyo. Itarathā visesanaṃ niratthakaṃ hotī’’ti. Apare pana ‘‘yathā bahūhi manussehi ekassa biḷālassa attano attano saṅkhalikā gīvāya ābaddhā biḷāle gacchante gacchanti ābaddhattā, na aññasmiṃ biḷāle gacchante gacchanti anābaddhattā, evamevassa bhikkhussa bahūhi saṅkhalikasadisā chandapārisuddhi dinnā, sā tasmiṃ bhikkhusmiṃ gacchante ^a^V3.0253^ea^ gacchati tasmiṃ saṅkhalikā viya ābaddhattā, na aññasmiṃ anābaddhattā’’ti vadanti. Sabbampetaṃ na sārato paccetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha sāro – yathā saṅkhalikāya paṭhamavalayaṃ dutiyaṃyeva valayaṃ pāpuṇāti, na tatiyaṃ, evamayampi pārisuddhidāyakena yassa dinnā, tato aññattha na gacchatīti saṅkhalikasadisattā ‘‘biḷālasaṅkhalikā’’ti vuttā. Biḷālasaṅkhalikagahaṇañcettha yāsaṃ kāsañci saṅkhalikānaṃ upalakkhaṇamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^165^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Santi saṅghassa karaṇīyānī’’ti vattabbe vacanavipallāsena ‘‘karaṇīya’’nti vuttaṃ. Tassa sammutidānakiccaṃ natthi. ‘‘Hatthapāsaṃ ānetabboyevā’’ti ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^168^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saṅghasannipātato paṭhamaṃ kātabbaṃ ^b^pubbakaraṇa^eb^nti vuttaṃ, pubbakaraṇato pacchā kātabbampi uposathakammato paṭhamaṃ kātabbattā ^b^pubbakicca^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Ubhayampi cetaṃ uposathakammato paṭhamaṃ kattabbattā katthaci ^b^pubbakicca^eb^micceva voharīyati ‘‘kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakicca’’ntiādīsu viya.

[03]^b^Uposatho^eb^ti ^a^M3.0279^ea^ tīsu uposathadivasesu aññataradivaso. Tasmiñhi sati idaṃ saṅghassa uposathakammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati. Yathāha ‘‘na ca, bhikkhave, anuposathe uposatho kātabbo’’ti (mahāva. 183). ^b^Yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattā^eb^ti yattakā bhikkhū tassa uposathakammassa pattā yuttā anurūpā sabbantimena paricchedena cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā, te ca kho hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ekasīmāyaṃ ṭhitā. ^b^Sabhāgāpattiyo ca na vijjantī^eb^ti ettha yaṃ sabbo saṅgho vikālabhojanādinā sabhāgavatthunā lahukāpattiṃ āpajjati, evarūpā ^b^‘‘vatthusabhāgā’’^eb^ti vuccanti. Etāsu hi avijjamānāsu visabhāgāsu vijjamānāsupi ^b^pattakallaṃ^eb^ hotiyeva.

[03]^b^Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na hontī^eb^ti ‘‘na, bhikkhave, sagahaṭṭhāya parisāyā’’ti (mahāva. 154) vacanato gahaṭṭho, ‘‘na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā nisinnaparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba’’ntiādinā (mahāva. 183) nayena vuttā bhikkhunī sikkhamānā sāmaṇero sāmaṇerī ^a^V3.0254^ea^ sikkhāpaccakkhātako antimavatthuajjhāpannako āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhittako pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittako paṇḍako theyyasaṃvāsako titthiyapakkantako tiracchānagato mātughātako pitughātako arahantaghātako bhikkhunīdūsako saṅghabhedako lohituppādako ubhatobyañjanakoti ime vīsati cāti ekavīsati puggalā vajjanīyā nāma, te hatthapāsato bahikaraṇavasena vajjetabbā. Etesu hi tividhe ukkhittake sati uposathaṃ karonto saṅgho pācittiyaṃ āpajjati, sesesu dukkaṭaṃ. Ettha ca ^b^tiracchānagato^eb^ti yassa upasampadā paṭikkhittā, sova adhippeto, titthiyā gahaṭṭheneva saṅgahitā. Etepi hi vajjanīyā. Evaṃ pattakallaṃ imehi catūhi aṅgehi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ajja me uposatho pannarasotipī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva ‘‘ajja me uposatho’’tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. ^b^Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. nidānavaṇṇanā) pana ‘‘ajja me uposatho cātuddasoti vā pannarasoti vā vatvā adhiṭṭhāmīti vattabba’’nti vuttaṃ.
[06]Saṅghuposathādikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^169^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nanu ^a^M3.0280^ea^ ca ‘‘na, bhikkhave, sāpattikena uposatho kātabbo, yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti evaṃ sāpattikassa uposathakaraṇe visuṃ paññattā āpatti na dissati, tasmā bhagavatā paññattaṃ ‘‘na sāpattikena uposatho kātabbo’’ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘yassa siyā āpatti…pe… paññattaṃ hotīti veditabba’’^eb^nti. Kiñcāpi visuṃ paññattā āpatti na dissati, atha kho ‘‘yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyyā’’tiādiṃ vadantena atthato paññattāyevāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Pārisuddhidānapaññāpanena cā^eb^ti imināva ‘‘sāpattikena pārisuddhipi na dātabbā’’ti dīpitaṃ hoti. Na hi sāpattiko samāno ‘‘pārisuddhiṃ dammi, pārisuddhiṃ me hara, pārisuddhiṃ me ārocehī’’ti vattumarahati. Tasmā pārisuddhiṃ dentena paṭhamaṃ santī āpatti desetabbā ‘‘ahaṃ, āvuso, itthannāmāya āpattiyā vematiko, yadā nibbematiko bhavissāmi, tadā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmī’’ti vatvā uposatho kātabbo. ‘‘Pātimokkhaṃ sotabba’’nti vacanato yāva ^a^V3.0255^ea^ nibbematiko na hoti, tāva sabhāgāpattiṃ paṭiggahetuṃ na labhati, aññesañca kammānaṃ parisuddho nāma hoti. ‘‘Puna nibbematiko hutvā desetabbaṃ na cā’’ti neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthi, desite pana doso natthi. ‘‘Ito vuṭṭhahitvā paṭikarissāmīti etthāpi eseva nayo’’ti ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Yathā sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāpattiṃ āpajjitvā ‘‘suṇātu me bhante, saṅgho…pe… paṭikarissatī’’ti ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhati, evaṃ tīhi ‘‘suṇantu me āyasmantā, ime bhikkhū sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpannā. Yadā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ suddhaṃ anāpattikaṃ passissanti, tadā tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissantī’’ti gaṇañattiṃ ṭhapetvā, dvīhi aññamaññaṃ ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Ekenapi ‘‘parisuddhaṃ labhitvā paṭikarissāmī’’ti ābhogaṃ katvā kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca vadanti.
[06]Āpattipaṭikammavidhikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^179^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ācārasaṇṭhāna^eb^nti ^a^M3.0281^ea^ ācārasaṇṭhiti. Ākarīyati pakāsīyati etenāti ^b^ākāro^eb^. Līnaṃ gamayati bodhetīti ^b^liṅgaṃ^eb^. Nimiyanti paricchijja ñāyanti etenāti ^b^nimittaṃ^eb^. Uddisīyanti apadisīyanti etenāti ^b^uddeso^eb^. ‘‘Amhākaṃ ida’’nti aññātaṃ aviditanti ^b^aññātakaṃ^eb^. Tañca atthato parasantakaṃyevāti āha ^b^‘‘aññesaṃ santaka’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^180^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nānāsaṃvāsakabhāva^eb^nti laddhinānāsaṃvāsakabhāvaṃ. Tassa abhibhavo nāma tesaṃ laddhivissajjāpananti āha ^b^‘‘taṃ diṭṭhiṃ na nissajjāpentīti attho’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^181^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uposathādhiṭṭhānatthaṃ sīmāpi nadīpi na gantabbā^eb^ti garukaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ vissajjetvā lahukassa akattabbattā vuttaṃ. ^b^Āraññakenāpi bhikkhunā^eb^ti ekacārikena āraññakabhikkhunā, yattha vā saṅghapahonakā bhikkhū na santi, tādise araññe vasantena. ^b^Tattha uposathaṃ katvāva gantabba^eb^nti tassa vasanaṭṭhāne saṅghuposathassa appavattanato vuttaṃ. ^b^Uposathantarāyo^eb^ti attano uposathantarāyo.

[03]^b^183^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Hatthapāsupagamanameva^eb^^a^V3.0256^ea^^b^pamāṇa^eb^nti bhikkhunīādayo ṭhitā vā hontu nisinnā vā, tesaṃ hatthapāsupagamanameva āpattiyā pamāṇanti adhippāyo, tasmā ekasīmāyampi hatthapāsaṃ jahāpetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Uposathakkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^184^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vassūpanāyikakkhandhake ^a^M3.0282^ea^^a^V3.0257^ea^^b^idha-saddo nipātamatto^eb^ti okāsaparidīpanassapi asambhavato atthantarassa abodhanato vuttaṃ. ^b^Aparajjugatāya assā^eb^ti iminā asamānādhikaraṇavisayo bāhiratthasamāsoyanti dasseti. ^b^Aparajjū^eb^ti āsāḷhīpuṇṇamito aparaṃ dinaṃ, pāṭipadanti attho. ^b^Assā^eb^ti āsāḷhīpuṇṇamiyā.

[03]^b^185^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anapekkhagamanena vā aññattha aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpanena vā āpatti veditabbā^eb^ti ettha anapekkhagamanena upacārātikkame āpatti veditabbā, sāpekkhagamanena aññattha aruṇuṭṭhāpanena āpatti veditabbā.

[03]^b^187-189^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tīṇi parihīnānī^eb^ti bhikkhunīnaṃ vaccakuṭiādīnaṃ paṭikkhittattā pahīnāni. ^b^Vāreyya^eb^nti āvāhavivāhamaṅgalaṃ. ^b^Suttanto^eb^ti attano paguṇasuttanto. ^b^Na palujjatī^eb^ti na vinassati na antaradhāyati.

[03]^b^199^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhikkhugatiko^eb^ti bhikkhunissitako. So pana yasmā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasanakapuriso’’^eb^ti. Sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā bahiddhā aruṇuṭṭhāpanaṃ ^a^V3.0258^ea^^b^ratticchedo. Animantitena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha animantitattā sattāhakiccaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassapi vassacchedo ceva dukkaṭañca hotīti veditabbaṃ. Yathāvuttañhi ratticchedakāraṇaṃ vinā tirovihāre vasitvā āgacchissāmīti gacchatopi vassacchedaṃ vadanti. ^b^Gantuṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Evaṃ gacchantena ca antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhiteneva ‘‘antosattāhe āgacchissāmī’’ti ābhogaṃ katvā gantabbaṃ. Sace ābhogaṃ akatvā upacārasīmaṃ atikkamati, chinnavassova hotīti vadanti. ^b^Bhaṇḍaka^eb^nti cīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Pahiṇantī^eb^ti cīvaradhovanādikammena pahiṇanti. ^b^Sampāpuṇituṃ^eb^^a^M3.0283^ea^^b^na sakkoti, vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘ajjeva āgamissāmī’’ti sāmantavihāraṃ gantvā puna āgacchantassa antarāmagge sace aruṇuggamanaṃ hoti, vassacchedopi na hoti, ratticchedadukkaṭañca natthīti vadanti. ^b^‘‘Ācariyaṃ passissāmī’’ti pana gantuṃ labhatī^eb^ti ‘‘agilānampi ācariyaṃ upajjhāyaṃ vā passissāmī’’ti sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ labhati. ^b^Sace pana naṃ ācariyo ‘‘ajja mā gacchā’’ti vadati, vaṭṭatī^eb^ti evaṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena gataṃ antosattāheyeva puna āgacchantaṃ sace ācariyo upajjhāyo vā ‘‘ajja mā gacchā’’ti vadati, vaṭṭati, sattāhātikkamepi anāpattīti adhippāyo, vassacchedo pana hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ sattāhassa bahiddhā vītināmitattā.
[03]^b^201^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sace dūraṃ gato hoti, sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo^eb^ti iminā vassacchedakāraṇe sati sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.

[03]^b^203^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Idha vassaṃ upemī’’ti tikkhattuṃ vattabba^eb^nti satthassāvihārattā ‘‘imasmiṃ vihāre’’ti avatvā ‘‘idha vassaṃ upemī’’ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ. ^b^Satthe pana vassaṃ upagantuṃ na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti kuṭikādīnaṃ abhāve ‘‘idha vassaṃ upemī’’ti vacībhedaṃ katvā upagantuṃ na vaṭṭati, ālayakaraṇamatteneva vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Vippakiratī^eb^ti visuṃ visuṃ gacchati. ^b^Tīsu ṭhānesu natthi vassacchede āpattī^eb^ti tehi saddhiṃ gacchantasseva natthi āpatti, tehi viyujjitvā gamane pana āpattiyeva, pavāretuñca na labhati.

[03]^b^204^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Seyyathāpi^eb^^a^V3.0259^ea^^b^pisācillikā^eb^ti ettha pisācā eva ^b^pisācillikā,^eb^ pisācadārakātipi vadanti. ^b^Pavisanadvāraṃ yojetvā^eb^ti sakavāṭabaddhameva yojetvā. ^b^Pañcannaṃ chadanāna^eb^nti tiṇapaṇṇaiṭṭhakasilāsudhāsaṅkhātānaṃ pañcannaṃ chadanānaṃ. Idañca yebhuyyena vuttanti veditabbaṃ rukkhādīsu ^a^M3.0284^ea^ padaracchadanāyapi kuṭikāya vassūpagamanassa vuttattā. ^b^Na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba^eb^nti vacībhedaṃ katvā vassūpagamanaṃ sandhāyeva paṭikkhepo, na ālayakaraṇavasena upagamanaṃ sandhāyāti vadanti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana avisesena vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyañca dutiyapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.84) ‘‘vassaṃ upagacchantena hi nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapi pañcannaṃ chadanānaṃ aññatarena channeyeva sadvārabandhe senāsane upagantabbaṃ. Tasmā vassakāle sace senāsanaṃ labhati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce labhati, hatthakammaṃ pariyesitvāpi kātabbaṃ. Hatthakammaṃ alabhantena sāmampi kātabbaṃ, na tveva asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba’’nti daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā asenāsanikassa nāvādiṃ vinā aññattha ālayo na vaṭṭatīti amhākaṃ khanti. Nāvāsatthavajesuyeva hi ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, nāvāya vassaṃ upagantu’’ntiādinā sati asati vā senāsane vassūpagamanassa visuṃ anuññātattā ‘‘na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba’’nti ayaṃ paṭikkhepo tattha na labbhatīti asati senāsane ālayavasenapi nāvādīsu upagamanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Ṭaṅkitamañco^eb^ nāma dīghe mañcapāde majjhe vijjhitvā aṭaniyo pavesetvā kato mañco. Tassa idaṃ upari idaṃ heṭṭhāti natthi, parivattetvā atthatopi tādisova hoti, taṃ susāne devaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapenti, catunnaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari pāsāṇaṃ attharitvā kataṃ gehampi ‘‘ṭaṅkitamañco’’ti vuccati.
[06]Vassaṃ anupagantabbaṭṭhānakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^205^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tassā lakkhaṇaṃ mahāvibhaṅge vutta^eb^nti catutthapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ‘‘yo imamhā āvāsā paṭhamaṃ pakkamissati, taṃ mayaṃ arahāti jānissāmā’’ti (pārā. 228) ettha dassitaṃ adhammikakatikavattalakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vadati, paratopi senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ adhammikaṃ katikavattaṃ āvi bhavissatiyeva.

[03]^b^207^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmā ^a^M3.0285^ea^^a^V3.0260^ea^ nānāsīmāyaṃ dvīsu āvāsesu vassaṃ vasantassa dutiye ‘‘vasāmī’’ti citte uppanne paṭhamasenāsanaggāho paṭippassambhati, puna paṭhameyeva ‘‘vasāmī’’ti citte uppanne dutiyo paṭippassambhati, tasmā ^b^‘‘tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Paṭissavassa visaṃvādanapaccayā hontampi dukkaṭaṃ satiyeva paṭissave hotīti āha ^b^‘‘tassa tassa paṭissave dukkaṭa’’^eb^nti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘tañca kho…pe… pacchā visaṃvādanapaccayā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Akaraṇīyo^eb^ti sattāhakaraṇīyena akaraṇīyo. ^b^Sakaraṇīyo^eb^ti sattāhakaraṇīyeneva sakaraṇīyo. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘sattāhakaraṇīyena akaraṇīyo sakaraṇīyo’’ti ca kasmā na vuttanti? ‘‘Akaraṇīyo’’ti vuttepi sattāhakaraṇīyena sakaraṇīyākaraṇīyatā viññāyatīti katvā na vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ parato ‘‘sattāhakaraṇīyena pakkamatī’’ti vāradvayepi ‘‘sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī’’ti ettakameva kasmā na vuttanti? Vuccate – tattha ‘‘sattāhakaraṇīyenā’’ti avatvā ‘‘sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī’’ti vutte so taṃ sattāhaṃ bahiddhā vītināmetīti na sakkā vattunti ‘‘sattāhakaraṇīyena pakkamatī’’ti vuttaṃ. Evañhi vutte sattāhassa adhikatattā so taṃ sattāhaṃ bahi vītināmetīti sakkā vattuṃ.

[03]Ettha ca ādimhi cattāro vārā nirapekkhagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttā, tatthāpi purimā dve vārā vassaṃ anupagatassa vasena vuttā, pacchimā pana dve vārā vassaṃ upagatassa vasena, tato paraṃ dve vārā sāpekkhagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttā, tatthāpi paṭhamavāro sāpekkhassapi sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā taṃ sattāhaṃ bahiddhā vītināmentassa vassacchedadassanatthaṃ vutto, itaro vuttanayeneva gantvā antosattāhe nivattantassa vassacchedābhāvadassanatthaṃ. ‘‘So sattāhaṃ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī’’ti ayaṃ pana vāro navamito paṭṭhāya gantvā sattāhaṃ bahiddhā vītināmentassapi vassacchedābhāvadassanatthaṃ vutto. Ettha ca ‘‘akaraṇīyo pakkamatī’’ti dutiyavārassa anāgatattā navamito paṭṭhāya gacchantenapi satiyeva karaṇīye gantabbaṃ, nāsatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ime ca satta vārā bahiddhā katauposathikassa vasena āgatā, apare ^a^M3.0286^ea^ satta antovihāraṃ gantvā katauposathassa vasenāti evaṃ purimikāya vasena cuddasa vārā vuttā, tato paraṃ pacchimikāya vasena teyeva cuddasa vārā vuttāti evametesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03]Imehi ^a^V3.0261^ea^ pana sabbavārehi vuttamatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘so tadaheva akaraṇīyotiādīsū’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Ko pana vādo dvīhatīhaṃ vasitvā antosattāhe nivattantassā^eb^ti vassaṃ upagantvā dvīhatīhaṃ vasitvā sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā antosattāhe nivattantassa ko pana vādo, kathā eva natthīti adhippāyo. ^b^Asatiyā pana vassaṃ na upetī^eb^ti ‘‘imasmiṃ vihāre imaṃ temāsaṃ vassaṃ upemī’’ti vacībhedaṃ katvā na upeti.

[03]^b^Komudiyā cātumāsiniyā^eb^ti pacchimakattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ. Sā hi kumudānaṃ atthitāya komudī, catunnaṃ vassikānaṃ māsānaṃ pariyosānattā ‘‘cātumāsinī’’ti vuccati. Tadā hi kumudāni supupphitāni honti, tasmā kumudānaṃ samūho, kumudāni eva vā ^b^komudā,^eb^ te ettha atthīti ^b^‘‘komudī’’^eb^ti vuccati, kumudavatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Paṭissavadukkaṭāpattikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Vassūpanāyikakkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^209^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pavāraṇakkhandhake ^a^M3.0287^ea^^a^V3.0262^ea^ ādito lāpo ^b^ālāpo,^eb^ vacanapaṭivacanavasena samaṃ lāpo ^b^sallāpo. Piṇḍāya paṭikkameyyā^eb^ti gāme piṇḍāya caritvā paccāgaccheyya. ^b^Avakkārapātiṃ dhovitvā upaṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti atirekapiṇḍapātaṃ apanetvā ṭhapanatthāya ekaṃ samuggapātiṃ dhovitvā ṭhapeyya. ^b^Samuggapāti^eb^ nāma samuggapuṭasadisā pāti. ^b^Appaharite^eb^ti aparūḷhaharite, yasmiṃ ṭhāne piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena vinassanadhammāni tiṇāni natthi, tasminti attho. Tena nittiṇañca mahātiṇagahanañca yattha sakaṭenapi chaḍḍite piṇḍapāte tiṇāni na vinassanti, tañca ṭhānaṃ pariggahitaṃ hoti. Bhūtagāmasikkhāpadassa hi avikopanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Appāṇake^eb^ti nippāṇake, piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena maritabbapāṇakarahite vā mahāudakakkhandhe. Parittodake eva hi bhattapakkhepena āluḷite sukhumapāṇakā maranti, na mahātaḷākādīsūti. Pāṇakānurakkhaṇatthañhi etaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Opilāpeyyā^eb^ti nimujjāpeyya.

[03]^b^Vaccaghaṭa^eb^nti ācamanakumbhī. ^b^Ritta^eb^nti rittakaṃ. ^b^Tuccha^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Avisayha^eb^nti ukkhipituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ atibhārikaṃ. ^b^Hatthavikārenā^eb^ti hatthasaññāya. Hatthehi ukkhipanaṃ hatthavilaṅghanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘hatthukkhepakenā’’^eb^ti. Atha vā vilaṅgheti desantaraṃ pāpeti etenāti vilaṅghako, hattho eva vilaṅghako hatthavilaṅghako, tena ^b^hatthavilaṅghakena,^eb^ aññamaññaṃ saṃsibbitahatthenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Dve hi janā hatthena hatthaṃ saṃsibbetvā dvīsu hatthesu ṭhapetvā uṭṭhapentā hatthavilaṅghakena uṭṭhapenti nāma. ^b^Titthiyasamādāna^eb^nti titthiyehi samādātabbaṃ.
[06]Aphāsukavihārakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^212^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dvemā^eb^^a^M3.0288^ea^^a^V3.0263^ea^, ^b^bhikkhave, pavāraṇā cātuddasikā ca pannarasikā cā^eb^ti ettha purimavassaṃvutthānaṃ pubbakattikapuṇṇamā, tesaṃyeva sace bhaṇḍanakārakehi upaddutā pavāraṇaṃ paccukkaḍḍhanti, atha kattikamāsassa kāḷapakkhacātuddaso vā pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā vā, pacchimavassaṃvutthānañca pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā eva vāti ime tayo pavāraṇadivasāti veditabbā. Idañca pakaticārittavasena vuttaṃ, tathārūpapaccaye pana sati dvinnaṃ kattikapuṇṇamānaṃ purimesu cātuddasesupi pavāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, teneva mahāvihāre bhikkhū cātuddasiyā pavāretvā pannarasiyā kāyasāmaggiṃ denti, cetiyagirimahadassanatthampi aṭṭhamiyā gacchanti, tampi cātuddasiyaṃ pavāretukāmānaññeva hoti.
[03]^b^213^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sace pana vuḍḍhataro hotī^eb^ti sace pavāraṇadāyako bhikkhu vuḍḍhataro hoti. ^b^Tena ca bhikkhunā^eb^ti pavāraṇadāyakena bhikkhunā.

[03]^b^222^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pannarasakesu ^b^pavāritamatte^eb^ti pavāritasamanantaraṃ. ^b^Avuṭṭhitāya parisāyā^eb^ti pavāretvā pacchā aññamaññaṃ kathentiyā. ^b^Ekaccāya vuṭṭhitāyā^eb^ti ekaccesu yathānisinnesu ekaccesu sakasakaṭṭhānaṃ gatesu. ^b^Puna pavāritabba^eb^nti punapi sabbehi samāgantvā pavāretabbaṃ. ^b^Āgacchanti samasamā, tesaṃ santike pavāretabba^eb^nti gate anānetvā nisinnānaññeva santike pavāretabbaṃ. ^b^Sabbāya vuṭṭhitāya parisāya āgacchanti samasamā, tesaṃ santike pavāretabba^eb^nti yadi sabbe vuṭṭhahitvā gatā sannipātetuñca na sakkā, ekacce sannipātetvā pavāretuṃ vaṭṭati, ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā kattabbasaṅghakammābhāvā vaggaṃ na hoti. Uposathepi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^237^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Natthi dinna’’ntiādinayappavattā dasavatthukā ^b^micchādiṭṭhi^eb^. ‘‘Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā ^a^V3.0264^ea^, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’’tiādinā sassatucchedasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ gaṇhātīti ^b^antaggāhikā^eb^.

[03]^b^240^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Catutthe^eb^^a^M3.0289^ea^^b^kate suṇantī^eb^ti catutthe pannarasikuposathe kate amhākaṃ pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapessantīti suṇanti. ^b^Evampi dve cātuddasikā hontī^eb^ti tatiyena saddhiṃ dve cātuddasikā honti.

[03]^b^241^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ayaṃ pavāraṇāsaṅgaho ekassa dinnopi sabbesaṃ dinnova hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ekassapi vasena dātabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āgantukā tesaṃ senāsanaṃ gahetuṃ na labhantī^eb^ti sacepi saṭṭhivassabhikkhū āgacchanti, tesaṃ senāsanaṃ gahetuṃ na labhanti. ^b^Pavāretvā pana antarāpi cārikaṃ pakkamituṃ labhantī^eb^ti pavāraṇāsaṅgahe kate antarā pakkamitukāmā saṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā pavāretuṃ labhanti. Sesamettha pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyameva.
[06]Pavāraṇakkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^242^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cammakkhandhake ^a^M3.0290^ea^^a^V3.0265^ea^^b^uṇṇapāvāraṇa^eb^nti uṇṇāmayaṃ pāvāraṇaṃ. ^b^Vihārapacchāyāya^eb^nti vihārapaccante chāyāyaṃ. Vihārassa vaḍḍhamānacchāyāyantipi vadanti.

[03]^b^243^eb^^b^.^eb^ Suttattho pana suttavaṇṇanātoyeva gahetabboti etthāyaṃ suttavaṇṇanā. ^b^Sītavane^eb^ti (a. ni. aṭṭha. 3.6.55) evaṃnāmake vane. Tasmiṃ kira paṭipāṭiyā pañca caṅkamanasatāni māpitāni, tesu thero attano sappāyaṃ caṅkamanaṃ gahetvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. Tassa āraddhavīriyassa hutvā caṅkamato pādatalāni bhijjiṃsu, jāṇūhi caṅkamato jāṇukānipi hatthatalānipi bhijjiṃsu, chiddāni ahesuṃ. Evaṃ āraddhavīriyo viharanto obhāsanimittamattakampi dassetuṃ nāsakkhi. Tassa vīriyena kilamitakāyassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pāsāṇaphalake nisinnassa yo vitakko udapādi, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha kho āyasmato’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^āraddhavīriyā^eb^ti paripuṇṇapaggahitavīriyā. ^b^Na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatī^eb^ti ‘‘sace ahaṃ ugghaṭitaññū vā vipañcitaññū vā neyyo vā, na me cittaṃ na vimucceyya, addhā pana padaparamo, yena me cittaṃ na muccatī’’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘saṃvijjanti kho panā’’^eb^tiādīni cintesi. Tattha ^b^bhogā^eb^ti upayogatthe paccattaṃ.

[03]^b^Pāturahosī^eb^ti therassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā ‘‘ayaṃ soṇo ajja sītavane padhānabhūmiyaṃ nisinno imaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi, gantvāssa vitakkaṃ sahoḍḍhaṃ gaṇhitvā vīṇopamakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessāmī’’ti sītavane pāturahosi. ^b^Paññatte āsane^eb^ti padhānikabhikkhū attano vasanaṭṭhāne ovadituṃ āgatassa buddhassa bhagavato nisīdanatthaṃ yathālābhena āsanampi paññapetvāva padhānaṃ karonti ^a^V3.0266^ea^, aññaṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇāni saṅgharitvā upari saṅghāṭiṃ paññapenti. Theropi āsanaṃ paññapetvāva padhānaṃ akāsi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘paññatte āsane’’ti.

[03]^b^Taṃ^eb^^a^M3.0291^ea^^b^kiṃ maññasī^eb^ti satthā ‘‘imassa bhikkhuno avasesakammaṭṭhānena attho natthi, ayaṃ gandhabbasippe cheko ciṇṇavasī, attano visaye kathiyamāne khippameva sallakkhessatī’’ti vīṇopamaṃ kathetuṃ ‘‘taṃ kiṃ maññasī’’tiādimāha. ^b^Vīṇāya tantissare kusalatā^eb^ nāma vīṇāya vādanakusalatā, so ca tattha kusalo. Mātāpitaro hissa ‘‘amhākaṃ putto aññaṃ sippaṃ sikkhanto kāyena kilamissati, idaṃ pana āsane nisinneneva sakkā uggaṇhitu’’nti gandhabbasippameva uggaṇhāpesuṃ. Tassa –
[21]‘‘Satta sarā tayo gāmā, mucchanā ekavīsati;
[22]Ṭhānā ekūnapaññāsa, iccete saramaṇḍalā’’ti. –

[07]Ādikaṃ gandhabbasippaṃ sabbameva paguṇaṃ ahosi. ^b^Accāyatā^eb^ti atiāyatā kharamucchanā. ^b^Saravatī^eb^ti sarasampannā. ^b^Kammaññā^eb^ti kammakkhamā kammayoggā. ^b^Atisithilā^eb^ti mandamucchanā. ^b^Same guṇe patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti majjhime sare ṭhapetvā mucchitā.

[03]^b^Accāraddha^eb^nti atigāḷhaṃ. ^b^Uddhaccāya saṃvattatī^eb^ti uddhatabhāvāya saṃvattati. ^b^Atilīna^eb^nti atisithilaṃ. ^b^Kosajjāyā^eb^ti kusītabhāvatthāya. ^b^Vīriyasamathaṃ adhiṭṭhāhī^eb^ti vīriyasampayuttaṃ samathaṃ adhiṭṭhāhi, vīriyaṃ samathena yojehīti attho. ^b^Indriyānañca samataṃ adhiṭṭhāhī^eb^ti saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ samataṃ samabhāvaṃ adhiṭṭhāhi. Tattha saddhaṃ paññāya, paññañca saddhāya, vīriyaṃ samādhinā, samādhiñca vīriyena yojayatā indriyānaṃ samatā adhiṭṭhitā nāma hoti. Sati pana sabbatthikā, sā sadāpi balavatīyeva vaṭṭati. Tañca pana nesaṃ yojanāvidhānaṃ ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.60-62) āgatanayena veditabbaṃ. ^b^Tattha ca nimittaṃ gaṇhāhī^eb^ti tasmiñca samabhāve sati yena ādāse mukhabimbeneva nimittena uppajjitabbaṃ, taṃ samathanimittaṃ vipassanānimittaṃ magganimittaṃ phalanimittañca gaṇha nibbattehīti evamassa satthā arahatte pakkhipitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.

[03]^b^Tattha ca nimittaṃ aggahesī^eb^ti samathanimittañca vipassanānimittañca aggahesi. ^b^Eko^eb^ti asahāyo. ^b^Vūpakaṭṭho^eb^ti vatthukāmehi ca kilesakāmehi ca kāyena ceva cittena ca vūpakaṭṭho. ^b^Appamatto^eb^ti ^a^V3.0267^ea^ kammaṭṭhāne satiṃ ^a^M3.0292^ea^ avijahanto. ^b^Ātāpī^eb^ti kāyikacetasikavīriyātāpena ātāpo. Ātappati kilesehīti ātāpo, vīriyaṃ. ^b^Pahitatto^eb^ti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pesitatto vissaṭṭhaattabhāvo, nibbāne vā pesitacitto. ^b^Na cirassevā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānārambhato na cireneva. ^b^Aññataro^eb^ti eko. ^b^Arahata^eb^nti bhagavato sāvakānaṃ arahantānaṃ abbhantaro eko mahāsāvako ahosīti attho.

[03]^b^244^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vusitavā^eb^ti vutthabrahmacariyavāso. ^b^Katakaraṇīyo^eb^ti catūhi maggehi kattabbaṃ katvā ṭhito. ^b^Ohitabhāro^eb^ti khandhabhāraṃ kilesabhāraṃ abhisaṅkhārabhārañca otāretvā ṭhito. ^b^Anuppattasadattho^eb^ti sadattho vuccati arahattaṃ, taṃ pattoti attho. ^b^Parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano^eb^ti khīṇabhavabandhano. ^b^Sammadaññā vimutto^eb^ti sammā hetunā kāraṇena jānitvā vimutto. ^b^Cha ṭhānānī^eb^ti cha kāraṇāni. ^b^Adhimutto hotī^eb^ti paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhito hoti. ^b^Nekkhammādhimutto^eb^tiādi sabbaṃ arahattavasena vuttaṃ. Arahattañhi sabbakilesehi nikkhantattā ^b^nekkhammaṃ,^eb^ teheva pavivittattā ^b^paviveko,^eb^ byāpajjābhāvato ^b^abyāpajjaṃ,^eb^ upādānassa khayante uppannattā ^b^upādānakkhayo,^eb^ taṇhāya khayante uppannattā ^b^taṇhakkhayo,^eb^ sammohābhāvato ^b^asammoho^eb^ti ca vuccati.

[03]^b^Kevalaṃ saddhāmattaka^eb^nti paṭivedharahitaṃ kevalaṃ paṭivedhapaññāya asammissaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ. ^b^Paṭicaya^eb^nti punappunaṃ karaṇena vaḍḍhiṃ. ^b^Vītarāgattā^eb^ti maggapaṭivedhena rāgassa vihatattāyeva nekkhammasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ paṭivijjhitvā sacchikatvā ṭhito hoti, phalasamāpattivihārena viharati, tanninnamānasoyeva hotīti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Lābhasakkārasiloka^eb^nti catupaccayalābhañca tesaṃyeva sukatabhāvañca vaṇṇabhaṇanañca. ^b^Nikāmayamāno^eb^ti icchamāno patthayamāno. ^b^Pavivekādhimutto^eb^ti ‘‘paviveke adhimutto aha’’nti evaṃ arahattaṃ byākarotīti attho.

[03]^b^Sīlabbataparāmāsa^eb^nti sīlañca vatañca parāmasitvā gahitaggahaṇamattaṃ. ^b^Sārato paccāgacchanto^eb^ti sārabhāvena jānanto. ^b^Abyāpajjādhimutto^eb^ti ^a^M3.0293^ea^ abyāpajjaṃ arahattaṃ byākaroti. Imināva nayena sabbavāresu attho daṭṭhabbo. Apicettha ‘‘nekkhammādhimuttoti imasmiṃyeva arahattaṃ kathitaṃ, sesesu pañcasu nibbāna’’nti eke vadanti. Apare ‘‘asammohādhimuttoti ^a^V3.0268^ea^ ettheva nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ, sesesu arahatta’’nti vadanti. Ayaṃ panettha sāro – ‘‘sabbesvevetesu arahattampi nibbānampi kathitamevāti.

[03]^b^Bhusā^eb^ti balavanto dibbarūpasadisā. ^b^Nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyantī^eb^ti etassa khīṇāsavassa cittaṃ gahetvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. Kilesā hi uppajjamānā cittaṃ gaṇhanti nāma. ^b^Amissīkata^eb^nti amissakataṃ. Kilesā hi ārammaṇena saddhiṃ cittaṃ missaṃ karonti, tesaṃ abhāvā amissīkataṃ. ^b^Ṭhita^eb^nti patiṭṭhitaṃ. ^b^Āneñjappatta^eb^nti acalanappattaṃ. ^b^Vayañcassānupassatī^eb^ti tassa cesa cittassa uppādampi vayampi passati. ^b^Bhusā vātavuṭṭhī^eb^ti balavā vātakkhandho. ^b^Neva naṃ saṅkampeyyā^eb^ti ekabhāgena cāletuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. ^b^Na sampakampeyyā^eb^ti thūṇaṃ viya sabbabhāgato kampetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. ^b^Na sampavedheyyā^eb^ti vedhetvā pavedhetvā pātetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.

[03]^b^Nekkhammaṃ adhimuttassā^eb^ti arahattaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitassa. Sesapadesupi arahattameva kathitaṃ. ^b^Upādānakkhayassa cā^eb^ti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Asammohañca cetaso^eb^ti cittassa ca asammohaṃ adhimuttassa. ^b^Disvā āyatanuppāda^eb^nti āyatanānaṃ uppādañca vayañca disvā. ^b^Sammā cittaṃ vimuccatī^eb^ti sammā hetunā nayena imāya vipassanāya paṭipattiyā phalasamāpattivasena cittaṃ vimuccati, nibbānārammaṇe adhimuccati. Atha vā iminā khīṇāsavassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadā kathitā. Tassa hi āyatanuppādaṃ disvā imāya vipassanāya adhigatassa ariyamaggassa ānubhāvena sabbakilesehi sammā cittaṃ vimuccati. Evaṃ ^b^tassa sammā vimuttassa…pe… na vijjati^eb^. Tattha ^b^santacittassā^eb^ti nibbutacittassa. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
[06]Soṇassa pabbajjākathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^246^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Addāriṭṭhakavaṇṇā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0294^ea^ abhinavāriṭṭhaphalavaṇṇā. Udakena tintakākapattavaṇṇātipi vadanti.
[03]^b^248^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhijīvanti ^a^V3.0269^ea^ etenāti ^b^abhijīvanikaṃ^eb^. Kintaṃ? Sippaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yena sippenā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^251^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uṇṇāhi katapādukā^eb^ti uṇṇālomamayakambalehi, uṇṇālomehi eva vā katapādukā. ^b^Na, bhikkhave, gāvīnaṃ visāṇesu gahetabba^eb^ntiādīsu ‘‘mokkhādhippāyena visāṇādīsu gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^253^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, purisayuttaṃ hatthavaṭṭaka^eb^nti ettha ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, purisayuttaṃ, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, hatthavaṭṭaka’’nti evaṃ paccekavākyaparisamāpanaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘purisayuttaṃ itthisārathi vā…pe… purisā vā, vaṭṭatiyevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pīṭhakasivika^eb^nti pīṭhakayānaṃ. ^b^Pāṭaṅki^eb^nti andolikāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.

[03]^b^254^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vāḷarūpānī^eb^ti āharimāni vāḷarūpāni. ‘‘Akappiyarūpākulo akappiyamañco pallaṅko’’ti ^b^sārasamāse^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Dīghalomako mahākojavo^eb^ti caturaṅgulādhikalomo kāḷakojavo. ‘‘Caturaṅgulādhikāni kira tassa lomānī’’ti vacanato caturaṅgulato heṭṭhā vaṭṭatīti vadanti. ^b^Vānacitro uṇṇāmayattharaṇo^eb^ti bhitticchedādivasena vicitro uṇṇāmayattharaṇo. ^b^Ghanapupphako uṇṇāmayattharaṇo^eb^ti uṇṇāmayalohitattharaṇo. ^b^Pakatitūlikā^eb^ti rukkhatūlalatātūlapoṭakītūlasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tūlānaṃ aññatarapuṇṇā tūlikā. ^b^‘‘Uddalomī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0295^ea^ ubhatodasaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ. ^b^Ekantalomī^eb^ti ekatodasaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇa’’nti ^b^dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.15) vuttaṃ, ^b^sārasamāse^eb^ pana ‘‘uddalomīti ekato uggatapupphaṃ. Ekantalomīti ubhato uggatapuppha’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Koseyyakaṭṭissamaya^eb^nti koseyyakasaṭamaya’’nti ^b^ācariyadhammapālattherena^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Suddhakoseyya^eb^nti ratanaparisibbanarahitaṃ. ^b^Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ panettha ‘‘ṭhapetvā ^a^V3.0270^ea^ tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni vaṭṭantī’’ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ‘‘ṭhapetvā tūlika’’nti etena ratanaparisibbanarahitāpi tūlikā na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. ‘‘Ratanaparisibbitāni vaṭṭantī’’ti iminā pana yāni ratanaparisibbitāni, tāni bhūmattharaṇavasena yathānurūpaṃ mañcādīsu ca upanetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitanti veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca vinayapariyāyaṃ patvā garuke ṭhātabbattā idha vuttanayenevettha vinicchayo veditabbo. Suttantikadesanāyaṃ pana gahaṭṭhānampi vasena vuttattā tesaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ ‘‘ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ…pe… vaṭṭantī’’ti vuttanti apare.

[03]^b^Ajinacammehī^eb^ti ajinamigacammehi. Tāni kira cammāni sukhumatarāni, tasmā dupaṭṭatipaṭṭāni katvā sibbanti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ajinapaveṇī’’^eb^ti. Uttaraṃ uparibhāgaṃ chādetīti ^b^uttaracchado,^eb^ vitānaṃ, tañca lohitavitānaṃ idhādhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘uparibaddhena rattavitānenā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Rattavitānesu ca kāsāvaṃ vaṭṭati, kusumbhādirattameva na vaṭṭatī’’ti ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Mahāupadhāna^eb^nti pamāṇātikkantaṃ upadhānaṃ. Ettha ca kiñcāpi ^b^dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni aṭṭha. 1.15) ‘‘alohitakāni dvepi vaṭṭantiyeva, tato uttari labhitvā aññesaṃ dātabbāni, dātuṃ asakkonto mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi labhatī’’ti avisesena vuttaṃ, ^b^senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (cūḷava. aṭṭha. 297) pana ‘‘agilānassa sīsupadhānañca pādupadhānañcāti dvayameva vaṭṭati, gilānassa bimbohanāni santharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi vaṭṭatī’’ti vuttattā gilānoyeva mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā nipajjituṃ labhatīti veditabbaṃ.
[06]Uccāsayanamahāsayanapaṭikkhepakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^256^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhinissāya^eb^^a^M3.0296^ea^^b^nisīditu^eb^nti apassāya nisīdituṃ.

[03]^b^257^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Papatake pabbate^eb^ti ettha ‘‘pavatte pabbate’’tipi paṭhanti, pavattanāmake pabbateti attho. ^b^Soṇo upāsako^eb^tiādīsu (udā. aṭṭha. 46) nāmena soṇo nāma, tīhi saraṇagamanehi ^a^V3.0271^ea^ upāsakattapaṭivedanena upāsako, koṭiagghanakassa kaṇṇapiḷandhanassa dhāraṇena ‘‘koṭikaṇṇo’’ti ca vattabbe ‘‘kuṭikaṇṇo’’ti evaṃ abhiññāto, na sukumārasoṇoti adhippāyo. Ayañhi āyasmato mahākaccānassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane abhippasanno saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhito papatake pabbate chāyūdakasampanne ṭhāne vihāraṃ kāretvā theraṃ tattha vasāpetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhāti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘āyasmato mahākaccānassa upaṭṭhāko hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]So kālena kālaṃ therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati, thero cassa dhammaṃ deseti, tena saṃvegabahulo dhammacariyāyaṃ ussāhajāto viharati. So ekadā satthena saddhiṃ vāṇijjatthāya ujjeniṃ gacchanto antarāmagge aṭaviyaṃ satthe niviṭṭhe rattiyaṃ janasambādhabhayena ekamantaṃ apakkamma niddaṃ upagañchi. Sattho paccūsavelāyaṃ uṭṭhāya gato, na ekopi soṇaṃ pabodhesi, sabbe vissaritvā agamiṃsu. So pabhātāya rattiyā pabujjhitvā uṭṭhāya kañci apassanto satthena gatamaggaṃ gahetvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gacchanto ekaṃ vaṭarukkhaṃ upagañchi. Tattha addasa ekaṃ mahākāyaṃ virūpadassanaṃ bībhacchaṃ purisaṃ aṭṭhito muttāni attano maṃsāni sayameva khādantaṃ, disvāna ‘‘kosi tva’’nti pucchi. Petosmi, bhanteti. Kasmā evaṃ karosīti? Attano pubbakammenāti. Kiṃ pana taṃ kammanti? Ahaṃ pubbe bhārukacchanagaravāsī kūṭavāṇijo hutvā paresaṃ santakaṃ vañcetvā khādiṃ, samaṇe ca bhikkhāya upagate ‘‘tumhākaṃ maṃsaṃ khādathā’’ti akkosiṃ, tena kammena etarahi imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavāmīti. Taṃ sutvā soṇo ativiya saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhi.

[03]Tato ^a^M3.0297^ea^ paraṃ gacchanto mukhato paggharitakāḷalohite dve petadārake passitvā tatheva pucchi, tepissa attano kammaṃ kathesuṃ. Te kira bhārukacchanagare dārakakāle gandhavāṇijjāya jīvikaṃ kappentā attano mātari khīṇāsave nimantetvā bhojentiyā gehaṃ gantvā ‘‘amhākaṃ santakaṃ kasmā samaṇānaṃ desi, tayā dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjanakasamaṇānaṃ mukhato kāḷalohitaṃ paggharatū’’ti akkosiṃsu. Te tena kammena niraye paccitvā tassa vipākāvasesena petayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā tadā imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanti. Tampi sutvā soṇo ativiya saṃvegajāto ahosi.

[03]So ujjeniṃ gantvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvā kuraragharaṃ paccāgato theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā katapaṭisanthāro tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Theropissa pavattinivattīsu ādīnavānisaṃse vibhāvento dhammaṃ ^a^V3.0272^ea^ desesi. So theraṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gato sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ upagato thokaṃyeva niddāyitvā pabujjhitvā sayanatale nisajja yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhituṃ āraddho. Tassa taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhato te ca petattabhāve anussarato saṃsāradukkhaṃ ativiya bhayānakaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāsi, pabbajjāya cittaṃ nami. So vibhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā theraṃ upagantvā attano ajjhāsayaṃ ārocetvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘atha kho soṇo upāsako…pe… pabbājetu maṃ, bhante, ayyo mahākaccāno’’^eb^ti.

[03]Tattha ^b^yathā yathā^eb^tiādipadānaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yena yena ākārena ayyo mahākaccāno dhammaṃ deseti ācikkhati paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttāniṃ karoti pakāseti, tena tena me upaparikkhato evaṃ hoti ‘‘yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ^b^ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ,^eb^ ekadivasampi kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ^b^ekantaparisuddhaṃ, saṅkhalikhitaṃ^eb^ likhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ caritabbaṃ, idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… caritu’’nti.

[03]Evaṃ attano parivitakkitaṃ soṇo upāsako therassa ārocetvā taṃ paṭipajjitukāmo ^b^‘‘icchāmahaṃ bhante’’^eb^tiādimāha. Thero pana ^a^M3.0298^ea^ ‘‘na tāvassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gata’’nti upadhāretvā ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno ^b^‘‘dukkaraṃ kho’’^eb^tiādinā pabbajjāchandaṃ nivāresi. Tattha ^b^ekaseyya^eb^nti adutiyaseyyaṃ. Ettha ca seyyāsīsena ‘‘eko tiṭṭhati, eko gacchati, eko nisīdatī’’tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ catūsu iriyāpathesu kāyavivekaṃ dīpeti, na ekikā hutvā sayanamattaṃ. ^b^Ekabhatta^eb^nti ‘‘ekabhattiko hoti rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.10, 194; ma. ni. 1.293 a. ni. 3.71) evaṃ vuttaṃ vikālabhojanā viratiṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Brahmacariya^eb^nti methunaviratibrahmacariyaṃ, sikkhattayānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ vā. ^b^Iṅghā^eb^ti codanatthe nipāto. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti geheyeva. ^b^Buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ anuyuñjā^eb^ti niccasīlauposathasīlaniyamādibhedaṃ pañcaṅgaṃ aṭṭhaṅgaṃ dasaṅgañca sīlaṃ tadanurūpañca samādhipaññābhāvanaṃ anuyuñja. Etañhi upāsakena pubbabhāge anuyuñjitabbaṃ buddhasāsanaṃ nāma. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kālayuttaṃ ekaseyyaṃ ekabhattaṃ brahmacariya’’^eb^nti.

[03]Tattha ^b^kālayutta^eb^nti cātuddasīpañcaddasīaṭṭhamīpāṭihārikapakkhasaṅkhātena kālena yuttaṃ, yathāvuttakāle vā tuyhaṃ anuyuñjantassa yuttaṃ patirūpaṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ, na sabbakālaṃ sabbanti adhippāyo ^a^V3.0273^ea^. Sabbametaṃ ñāṇassa aparipakkattā tassa kāmānaṃ duppahānatāya sammā paṭipattiyaṃ yogyaṃ kārāpetuṃ vadati, na pabbajjāchandaṃ nivāretuṃ. ^b^Pabbajjābhisaṅkhāro^eb^ti pabbajituṃ ārambho ussāho. ^b^Paṭippassambhī^eb^ti indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā saṃvegassa ca nātitikkhabhāvato vūpasami. Kiñcāpi paṭippassambhi, therena vuttavidhiṃ pana anutiṭṭhanto kālena kālaṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsanto dhammaṃ suṇāti. Tassa vuttanayeneva dutiyampi pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppajji, therassa ca ārocesi, dutiyampi thero paṭikkhipi. Tatiyavāre pana ñāṇassa paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā ‘‘idāni naṃ pabbājetuṃ kālo’’ti thero pabbājesi, pabbajitañca taṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni atikkamitvā gaṇaṃ pariyesitvā upasampādesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dutiyampi kho soṇo…pe… upasampādesī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Tattha ^b^appabhikkhuko^eb^ti katipayabhikkhuko. Tadā kira bhikkhū yebhuyyena majjhimadeseyeva vasiṃsu, tasmā tattha katipayā eva ahesuṃ ^a^M3.0299^ea^. Te ca ekasmiṃ gāme eko, ekasmiṃ nigame dveti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ vasiṃsu. ^b^Kicchenā^eb^ti dukkhena. ^b^Kasirenā^eb^ti āyāsena. ^b^Tato tato^eb^ti tasmā tasmā gāmanigamādito. Therena hi katipaye bhikkhū ānetvā aññesu ānīyamānesu pubbe ānītā kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamiṃsu, kañci kālaṃ āgametvā puna tesu ānīyamānesu itare pakkamiṃsu. Evaṃ punappunaṃ ānayanena sannipāto cireneva ahosi. Theropi tadā ekavihārī ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ…pe… sannipātāpetvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Vassaṃvutthassā^eb^ti vassaṃ upagantvā vusitavato. ^b^Ediso ca ediso cā^eb^ti evarūpo ca evarūpo ca. ‘‘Evarūpāya nāma rūpakāyasampattiyā samannāgato, evarūpāya dhammakāyasampattiyā samannāgato’’ti ^b^sutoyeva me so bhagavā. Na ca mayā sammukhā diṭṭho^eb^ti ettha pana puthujjanasaddhāya eva āyasmā soṇo bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosi. Aparabhāge pana satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā paccūsasamayaṃ ajjhiṭṭho soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggiyāni satthu sammukhā aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā atthadhammapaṭisaṃvedī hutvā bhaṇanto dhammupasañhitapāmojjādimukhena samāhito sarabhaññapariyosāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto anupubbena arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Etadatthameva hissa bhagavatā attanā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāso āṇattoti vadanti.

[03]Keci panāhu ‘‘na ca mayā sammukhā diṭṭhoti idaṃ rūpakāyadassanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Āyasmā hi soṇo pabbajitvā therassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto anupasampannova ^a^V3.0274^ea^ sotāpanno hutvā upasampajjitvā ‘upāsakāpi sotāpannā honti, ahampi sotāpanno, kimettha citta’nti uparimaggatthāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā antovasseyeva chaḷabhiñño hutvā visuddhipavāraṇāya pavāresi. Ariyasaccadassanena bhagavato dhammakāyo diṭṭho nāma hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī’ti (saṃ. ni. 3.87). Tasmāssa dhammakāyadassanaṃ pageva siddhaṃ, pavāretvā pana rūpakāyaṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosī’’ti.

[03]^b^Pāsādika^eb^ntiādipadānaṃ ^a^M3.0300^ea^ attho aṭṭhakathāyameva vutto. Tattha ^b^visūkāyikavipphanditāna^eb^nti paṭipakkhabhūtānaṃ diṭṭhicittavipphanditānanti attho. ^b^Pāsādika^eb^nti (udā. aṭṭha. 10) vā dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaasītianubyañjanabyāmappabhāketumālālaṅkatāya samantapāsādikāya attano sarīrappabhāya sampattiyā rūpakāyadassanabyāvaṭassa janassa sabbabhāgato pasādāvahaṃ. ^b^Pasādanīya^eb^nti dasabalacatuvesārajjachaasādhāraṇañāṇaaṭṭhārasaāveṇikabuddhadhammappabhutiaparimāṇaguṇagaṇasamannāgatāya dhammakāyasampattiyā parikkhakajanassa pasādanīyaṃ pasīditabbayuttaṃ pasādakaṃ vā. ^b^Santindriya^eb^nti cakkhādipañcindriyalolatāvigamena vūpasantapañcindriyaṃ. ^b^Santamānasa^eb^nti chaṭṭhassa manindriyassa nibbisevanabhāvūpagamanena vūpasantamānasaṃ. ^b^Uttamadamathasamathaṃ anuppatta^eb^nti lokuttarapaññāvimutticetovimuttisaṅkhātaṃ uttamaṃ damathaṃ samathañca anuppatvā adhigantvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^Danta^eb^nti suparisuddhakāyasamācāratāya hatthapādakukkuccābhāvato davādiabhāvato ca kāyena dantaṃ. ^b^Gutta^eb^nti suparisuddhavacīsamācāratāya niratthakavācābhāvato ravādiabhāvato ca vācāya guttaṃ. ^b^Yatindriya^eb^nti suparisuddhamanosamācāratāya ariyiddhiyogena abyāvaṭaappaṭisaṅkhupekkhābhāvato ca manindriyavasena yatindriyaṃ. ^b^Nāga^eb^nti chandādivasena agamanato, pahīnānaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ apunāgamanato apaccāgamanato kassacipi āgussa sabbathāpi akaraṇato, punabbhavassa ca agamanatoti imehi kāraṇehi nāgaṃ. Ettha ca ‘‘pāsādika’’nti iminā rūpakāyena bhagavato pamāṇabhūtataṃ dīpeti, ‘‘pasādanīya’’nti iminā dhammakāyena. ‘‘Santindriya’’ntiādinā sesehi pamāṇabhūtataṃ dīpeti, tena catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse anavasesato sattānaṃ bhagavato pamāṇabhāvo pakāsitoti veditabbo. ^b^Ekavihāre^eb^ti ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ. Gandhakuṭi hi idha ‘‘vihāro’’ti adhippeto. ^b^Vatthu^eb^nti vasituṃ.

[03]^b^258^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajjhokāse vītināmetvā^eb^ti (udā. aṭṭha. 46) ajjhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā. ‘‘Yasmā bhagavā āyasmato soṇassa samāpattisamāpajjanena paṭisanthāraṃ karonto sāvakasādhāraṇā sabbā samāpattiyo ^a^M3.0301^ea^ anulomapaṭilomaṃ samāpajjanto bahudeva rattiṃ ajjhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā pāde pakkhāletvā vihāraṃ pāvisi, tasmā āyasmāpi soṇo bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ sabbā tā samāpattiyo samāpajjanto bahudeva rattiṃ ajjhokāse ^a^V3.0275^ea^ nisajjāya vītināmetvā pāde pakkhāletvā vihāraṃ pāvisī’’ti keci vadanti. Pavisitvā ca bhagavatā anuññāto cīvaraṃ tirokaraṇīyaṃ katvāpi bhagavato pādapasse nisajjāya vītināmesi. ^b^Ajjhesī^eb^ti āṇāpesi. ^b^Paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsitu^eb^nti bhikkhu tuyhaṃ dhammo bhāsituṃ upaṭṭhātu ñāṇamukhaṃ āgacchatu, yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇāhīti attho.
